9 Nana rā, kua tuhia tēnei mea i runga i te whakaaro kia whakapono ai koutou ki tērā; ā, ki te whakapono koutou ki tērā ka whakapono anō koutou ki tēnei; ā, ki te whakapono koutou ki tēnei ka mōhio koutou e pā ana ki ō koutou tūpuna, me ngā mahinga whakamīharo i meatia ai e te mana o te Atua ki waenganui i a rātou.

10 Ā, ka mōhio anō hoki koutou e pā ana ki ngā uri o Hākopa; nō reira kua tatauria iho koutou i waenganui i te iwi o te kawenata tuatahi; ā, mehemea ka whakapono koutou ki te Karaiti, kātahi ka rumakina, ki te wai tuatahi, kātahi ki te ahi me te Wairua Tapu, e whai ana i te tauira a te Kaiwhakaora, e rite ana ki tērā i whakahaua ai tātou, ka ora koutou hei te rā whakawā. Āmine.
morm 8:
[center][font_size=26]Upoko 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ka whai ngā Rāmana ki te whakangaro atu i ngā Nīwhai—Ka puta mai te Pukapuka a Moromona i runga i te mana o te Atua—Ka whakapuakina atu ngā auē mō te hunga e whakangā atu i te riri me te ngangaretanga ki te mahi a te Ariki—Ka puta mai te tuhinga Nīwhai i te rā o te whakariharihatanga, te kinonga haeretanga, me te whakaparahakotanga. Takiwā T.A. 400–421.[/i]

1 Nana, ka whakaoti au, a Moronai, i te tuhinga a tōku matua, a Moromona. Nana, He ruarua noa ngā mea kei ahau hei tuhituhi, ko ngā mea i whakahaua au e tōku matua.

2 Ināianei ā, i pahawa ake, nā, whai muri iho i te pakanga nui whakaharahara i Kamora, nana, ka arumia ngā Nīwhai i mawhiti atu ai ki roto i te whenua whakatetonga e ngā Rāmana, kia whakangaromia rawatia rātou.

3 Ā, i whakamatea anō hoki tōku matua e rātou, ā, ko ahau anake i mahue iho nei ki te tuhituhi i te kōrero pōuri mō te whakangaromanga o tōku iwi. Engari nana, kua riro rātou, ā, māku e whakatutuki i te whakahau a tōku matua. Ā, mehemea rānei ka whakamate rātou i ahau, kāore au i te mōhio.

4 Nō reira ka tuhituhi au, ā, ka huna anō i ngā tuhinga ki roto i te whenua; ā, kāore he tikanga ki hea haere ai au.

5 Nana, nā tōku matua tēnei tuhinga i hanga, ā, kua tuhia anōtia e ia tō reira tikanga. Ā nana, kua tuhi au me i whai wāhi au i runga i ngā papa, engari kāore ōku wāhi; ā, kāore ōku oa, nā te mea ko tōku kotahi tēnei. Kua whakamatea tōku matua i te pakanga, me ōku huānga katoa, ā, kāore ōku hoa, he wāhi rānei hei haerenga mōku; ā, kāore au e mōhio ana ki te roa e tuku ai te Ariki kia ora ahau.

6 Nana, kua pahemo atu ngā tau whā rau mai i te haerenga mai a tō tātou Ariki, tō tātou Kaiwhakaora.

7 Ā nana, kua arumia tōku iwi e ngā Rāmana, ngā Nīwhai, heke iho ana i tēnā pā ki tēnā pā, ā, mai i tēnā wāhi ki tēnā wāhi, tae atu pū anō ki te wā kua kore noa iho rātou; ā, he nui tō rātou hinganga; āe rā, he nui whakamīharo te whakangaromanga o tōku iwi, ngā Nīwhai.

8 Ā nana, nā te ringa o te Ariki i mea. Ā nana anō hoki, kei te whawhai ngā Rāmana ki a rātou anō; ā, kei tētahi huringa tonu o te kōhuru me te whakahekenga toto te mata katoa o tēnei whenua; ā, kāore tētahi e mōhio ana ki te mutunga o te pakanga.

9 Ināianei ā, nana, kāore au e kōrero atu anō e pā ana ki a rātou, nā te mea kāore he tangata i kō atu i ngā Rāmana me ngā kaipāhua e noho ana i runga i te mata o tēnei whenua.

10 Ā, kāore he tangata i reira e mōhio ana ki te Atua pono hāunga ko ngā apataki a Ihu, ko rātou nei i noho mai nei i te whenua tae atu ana ki te wā i nui rawa atu te kino o te iwi nā konā kāore te Ariki i tuku kia noho tonu rātou i roto i te iwi; ā, kāore tētahi tangata e mōhio ana kei hea rātou e noho ana i runga i te mata o te whenua.

11 Engari nana, kua kite māua ko tōku matua i a rātou, ā, kua minita mai rātou ki a māua.

12 Ā, ko te tangata e whiwhi nei i tēnei tuhinga, ā, e kore nei e whakahē nō ngā hapa kei roto rā, ko ia te mea e mōhio ai ki ngā mea nui ake i ēnei. Nana, ko Moronai ahau; ā, mehemea i taea, kua whakamōhio atu au ki a koutou i ngā mea katoa.

13 Nana, ka whakakapi au i taku kōrero e pā ana ki tēnei iwi. Ko au te tama a Moromona, ā, he uri tōku matua nō Nīwhai.

14 Ā, ko au anō tēnā e huna ake ai i tēnei tuhinga ki te Ariki; kāore he painga o aua papa, nā te whakahau a te Ariki. Nā te mea he pono tana kōrero e kore tētahi e mau ki ēnei kia rapu taonga ai ia; engari he utu nui tō reira tuhinga; ā, ko te tangata e whakaputaina mai ki te māramatanga, ko ia te mea e manaakitia ai e te Ariki.

15 Nā te mea kāore tētahi e whiwhi i te kaha kia whakaputaina mai ki te māramatanga, ki te kore e hoatu ki a ia e te Atua; nā te mea e hiahia ana te Atua kia meatia tērā i runga i te karu hāngai ki tōna korōria, ki te oranga rānei o te iwi kawenata onamata o te Ariki kua whakamararatia atu nei.

16 Ā, kua manaakitia te tangata e whakaputa ai i tēnei mea ki te māramatanga; nā te mea ka whakaputaina mai i te pōuritanga ki te māramatanga, e rite ana ki te kupu a te Atua; āe rā, ka whakaputaina mai i te whenua, ā, ka pīataata atu i roto i te pōuritanga, ā, ka tau mai ki te mātauranga o te iwi; ā, ka meatia tēnei i runga i te mana o te Atua.

17 Ā, mehemea he hapa i reira he hapa ērā nō te tangata. Engari nana, kāore mātou e mōhio ana ki tētahi hapa; hei aha koa kei te mōhio te Atua ki ngā mea katoa; nō reira, tukuna te tangata e whakahē ana kia mōhio, kei tika mōna te kāpura o te ao rēwera.

18 Ā, ko te tangata e kī ai: Whakakitea mai ki ahau, ki te kore ka patua koe—tukuna ia kia mōhio kei whakahau ia i ērā mea e whakakāhoretia ana e te Ariki.

19 Nana rā, ko te tangata e whakawā taikaha nei ka whakawākia taikahatia anō hoki ia; nā te mea ka rite tana utu ki āna mahinga; nō reira, ko te tangata e patu ana, ka patua anō hoki ia, e te Ariki.

20 Tirohia tā te karaipiture e mea nei—e kore te tangata e patu, e kore rānei e whakawā; nā te mea māku te whakawākanga, e ai tā te Ariki, ā, māku anō hoki te rapunga utu, ā, māku e whakautu.

21 Ā, ko te tangata e whakangā atu i te riri me te ngangaretanga ki te mahi a te Ariki, ā, ki te iwi kawenata a te Ariki ko rātou nei te whare o Iharaira, ā, ka mea: Ka whakangaro atu mātou i te mahi a te Ariki, ā, kāore te Ariki e maumahara ki tana kawenata i kawenata ai ia ki te whare o Iharaira—ka tika mōna kia tuakina iho, ā, kia makaia atu ki roto i te ahi;

22 Nā te mea ka huri tonu atu ngā tikanga mau tonu a te Ariki, kia tutuki āna whakaari katoa.

23 Tirohia ngā poropititanga a Ihāia. Nana, kāore e taea ana e au ērā mea te tuhi. Āe rā, nana ko taku kupu tēnei ki a koutou, nā, ka karanga ake aua hunga tapu kua haere nei i mua i ahau, ko rātou nei te hunga kua nōhia nei te whenua, āe rā, mai i te puehu pū anō tā rātou karanga ake ki te Ariki; ā, e ora ana te Ariki ka mahara ia i te kawenata i kawenata ai ia ki a rātou.

24 Ā, e mōhio ana ia ki ā rātou inoi, nā, he mea wawao mō ō rātou huānga. Ā, e mōhio ana ia ki tō rātou whakapono, nā te mea i taea e rātou ngā maunga te nuku i runga i tōna ingoa; ā, i taea e rātou te whenua te tūoioi i runga i tōna ingoa; ā, nā te mana o tana kupu rātou i mea kia ngahoro iho ngā whareherehere ki te whenua; āe rā, kāore noa iho i taea rātou e te oumu ahi, kāore rānei i taea e ngā kararehe mohoao, e ngā nākahi paitini rānei, he mea nā te kaha o tana kupu.

25 Ā nana, i wawao ake anō ā rātou inoi mō te tangata māna ēnei mea e whakaputa.

26 Ā, kāore he aha e kī ai tētahi e kore ērā mea e puta mai, nā te mea kāore e kore ka puta mai ērā mea, nā te mea kua kōrerotia nei e te Ariki, nā te mea ka puta ērā mea i te whenua, mā te ringa o te Ariki, kāore e taea ana e tētahi te whakakore; ā, ka puta mai i tētahi rā e kīa ai kua mutu ngā merekara; ā, ka puta mai me te mea nei e kōrero ana tētahi i te hunga mate.

27 Ā, ka pahawa ake i tētahi rā e karanga ake ai te toto o te hunga tapu ki te Ariki, nā ngā whakakotahitanga huna me ngā mahinga o te pōuritanga.

28 Āe rā, ka puta mai i tētahi rā e whakakāhoretia ai te mana o te Atua, ā, ka pokea ngā hāhi, ā, ka nuku ake i runga i te whakapehapeha o ō rātou ngākau; āe rā, i roto i tētahi rā anō e rewa ake ngā kaiārahi o ngā hāhi me ngā kaiako i runga i te whakapehapeha o ō rātou ngākau, tae atu ana ki tā rātou hae ki te hunga nō ō rātou hāhi.

29 Āe rā, ka puta mai i tētahi rā e rangona ai ngā ahi, ngā tūpuhi, me ngā kohu paoa i ngā whenua kē;

30 Ā, ka rangona hoki ngā pakanga, me ngā rongo pakanga, me ngā rū whenua i ngā wāhi maha.

31 Āe rā, ka puta mai i tētahi rā e nui ai ngā pokenga i runga i te mata o te whenua; ngā kōhurutanga, me ngā pāhuatanga, ngā rūkahu, ngā tinihanga, ngā mahi pūremu, me ngā tūmomo mōrikarika katoa o ia āhua, o ia āhua; e kī ai ngā mea tokomaha, Me mahi pēnei, me mahi pēnā rānei, kāore ōna tikanga, nā te mea mā te Ariki ngā mea pērā e tautoko hei te rā whakamutunga. Engari auē te mate mō te hunga pērā, nā te mea kei roto rātou i te au o te kawa, ā, kei roto i ngā herenga o te hē.

32 Āe rā, ka puta mai i tētahi rā e hangaia ake ai ngā hāhi e kī ai: Haere mai ki ahau, ā, ka murua koutou i ō koutou hara mō te moni.

33 E koutou te hunga kino me te hunga parori kē me te hunga kakī mārō, he aha koutou i hangaia ake ai ngā hāhi kia whaitaonga ai koutou? He aha koutou i whakapeau ai i te kupu tapu a te Atua, kia tōia mai te whakawākanga whakahē ki runga i ō koutou wairua? Nana, titiro atu koutou ki ngā whakakitenga a te Atua; nana rā, e whakatata mai ana te wā e tutuki katoa ai ēnei mea katoa.

34 Nana, kua whakakitea mai nei ki ahau e te Ariki ngā mea nui whakamīharo e pā ana ki ērā mea e puta mai ai, hei te rā e puta mai ēnei mea ki waenganui i a koutou.

35 Nana, e kōrero atu nei au ki a koutou me te mea nei kei konei koutou, heoi, kāore koutou i konei. Engari nana, kua whakakitea mai e Ihu Karaiti ki ahau, ā, e mōhio ana au ki tā koutou mahi.

36 Ā, e mōhio ana au kei te hīkoi koutou i runga i te whakapehapeha o ō koutou ngākau; ā, he ruarua noa iho ngā mea kāore e neke ake i a rātou anō i runga i te whakapehapeha o ō rātou ngākau, ki te whakamau i ngā kākahu pai whakaharahara, ki te hae, ki te totohenga, ki te mauāhara, ki te whakatoi, ki ngā tūmomo kino katoa; ā, ko ō koutou hāhi, āe rā, ia mea, ia mea, kua pokea haeretia nā te whakapehapeha o ō koutou ngākau.

37 Nana rā, he nui ake tō koutou aroha ki te putea, me ā koutou rawa, me ō koutou kahu papai, me ngā whakanikoniko o ō koutou wharekarakia, i tō koutou aroha ki te hunga rawakore me te hunga hapa, ki te hunga tūroro me te hunga e mamae ana.

38 E koutou e ngā pokenga, e koutou e ngā arero rua, e koutou e ngā kaiako, e hokona atu koutou e koutou anō mō ērā mea e waikura ai, he aha i poke ai i a koutou te hāhi tapu o te Atua? He aha koutou e whakamā ai kia tangohia ake ki runga i a koutou te ingoa o te Karaiti? He aha koutou e kore ai e whakaaro ake he nui ake te pai o tētahi haringa mutunga kore i tō taua pōuri e kore nei e mate—he mea nā te whakamoemiti o te ao?

39 He aha koutou e whakapaipai ai i a koutou anō ki aua mea kāore nei ōna oranga, heoi, ka tuku i te hunga matekai, me te hunga e hapa ana, me te hunga tū tahanga, ā, kia hipa atu i a koutou te hunga māuiui me te hunga e mamae ana, ā, kāore koutou e aro atu ki a rātou?

40 Āe rā, he aha koutou e hanga ake ai i ō koutou mōrikarikatanga huna kia whai taonga ai koutou, ā, ka mea kia tangi ngā pouaru i te aroaro o te Ariki, me ngā pani anō hoki kia tangi i te aroaro o te Ariki, me te toto o ō rātou matua me ā rātou hoatāne kia karanga ake ki te Ariki i te whenua, kia rapu utu i runga i ō koutou māhunga?

41 Nana, kei te werewere iho te hoari o te ngakinga mate i runga i a koutou; ā, e whakatata mai ana te wā e ngaki ai ia i te toto o te hunga tapu ki runga i a koutou, nā te mea e kore ia e tuku kia roa atu ai ā rātou karanga.
morm 9:
[center][font_size=26]Upoko 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ka karanga ake a Moronai ki te hunga e kore nei e whakapono i te Karaiti kia rīpenetā—Ka whakapuakina e ia tētahi Atua merekara e tuku ai i ngā whakakitenga me te riringi iho i ngā koha me ngā tohu ki runga i te hunga ū—Ka mutu ngā merekara nā te korenga o te whakapono—Ka whai ngā tohu i te hunga whakapono—Ka ākina te tangata kia mātau ai, ā, kia pupuri i ngā whakahaunga. Takiwā T.A. 401–421.[/i]

1 Ināianei ā, e kōrero ana anō hoki au e pā ana ki te hunga kāore nei i te whakapono i te Karaiti.

2 Nana, ka whakapono rānei koutou hei te rā o tā koutou toronga—nana, ina haere mai te Ariki, āe rā, ko taua rā nui pū anō e pōkaia ake ai te whenua kia rite ai ki tētahi pukapuka pōkai, ā, ka rewa iho ngā pūmotu i te wera whitawhita, āe rā, hei taua rā nui ina kawea mai koutou kia tū ai i te aroaro o te Reme a te Atua—ko reira koutou kī ake ai kāore he Atua?

3 Ko reira koutou whakakore tonu i te Karaiti, ka taea rānei e koutou te titiro ake ki te Reme a te Atua? E whakaaro ana rānei koutou ka noho koutou me ia i raro i tētahi mōhioranga ki tō koutou kaniawhea? E whakaaro ana rānei koutou ka hari koutou kia noho ki tērā Mea Tapu, i te mea e ohooho ana ō koutou wairua i runga i te mātauranga ki te kaniawhea mō tā koutou takahi noa i āna ture?

4 Nana, ko taku kupu tēnei ki a koutou ka nui ake tō koutou pōuri ki te noho tahi me tētahi Atua tapu, ki tētahi Atua tika i runga i te mātauranga ki tō koutou poke i tōna aroaro, i tō koutou me i noho tahi me ngā wairua kua whakawākia kia noho i te ao rēwera.

5 Nana rā, ina kawea mai koutou kia kite ai i tō koutou tahanga i te aroaro o te Atua, me te korōria anō hoki o te Atua, me te tapu o Ihu Karaiti, ka tahuna ki runga i a koutou he kapura ahi e kore nei e taea te tinei.

6 Kāti rā e koutou e te hunga whakaponokore, tahuri mai koutou ki te Ariki; karanga kaha ake ki te Matua i runga i te ingoa o Ihu, me kore pea koutou e kitea kohakoretia, he poke kore, he pūrotu, ā, he mā, i te mea kua whakamākia e te toto o te Reme, hei taua rā whakamutunga nui.

7 Hei āpiti anō, kei te kōrero atu au ki a koutou te hunga e whakakore i ngā whakakitenga a te Atua, ā, e kī ake ana kua whakamutua atu ērā mea, nā, kāore he whakakitenga, he poropititanga rānei, he takoha rānei, he mahutanga rānei, he kōrerotanga rānei i ngā reo kē, me te whakamāoritanga i ngā reo;

8 Nana ko taku kupu tēnei ki a koutou, kāore te tangata e mōhio ana ki te rongopai a te Karaiti e whakakore nei i ēnei mea; āe rā, kāore anō ia kia pānui i ngā karaipiture; mehemea i pānui, kāore ia i te mārama ki ērā mea.

9 Nā te mea kāore nei mātou e pānui nei he rite te Atua inānahi, ināianei, ā, āke tonu atu, ā, kāore he paku ātarangi o te panonitanga i roto i a ia?

10 Ināianei ā, mehemea kua whakaarohia ake e koutou tētahi atua e tīni ana, ā, kei roto rā hoki tētahi ātarangi panonitanga, kātahi rā kua whakaarohia ake e koutou anō tētahi atua ehara nei i te Atua mahi merekara.

11 Engari nana, māku koutou e whakakite atu tētahi Atua mahi merekara, ko te Atua pū anō o Aperahama, ā, me te Atua anō o Īhaka, me te Atua o Hākopa; ā, ko taua Atua anō nāna nei ngā rangi me te whenua i hanga, me ngā mea katoa kei roto.

12 Nana, nāna nei a Arama i hanga, ā, nā Arama puta mai ai te takanga o te tangata. Ā, nā te takanga o te tangata haere mai ai a Ihu Karaiti, ko te Matua pū anō o te Tama; ā, nā te haerenga mai a te Karaiti puta mai ai te hokonga o te tangata.

13 Ā, nā te hokonga o te tangata, i puta mai ai i a Ihu Karaiti, kua whakahokia mai rātou ki te aroaro o te Ariki; āe rā, mā konei hokona ai ngā tāngata katoa, nā te mea ka puta i te matenga o te Karaiti te aranga, e puta ake ai i reira tētahi hokonga mai i tētahi moe mutunga kore, mai i taua moe whakaohongia ake ai ngā tāngata katoa i runga i te mana o te Atua ina whakatangihia ake te tētere; ā, ka puta mai rātou, nui mai, iti mai, ā, ka tū katoa rātou i mua i tōna pae, I te mea kua hokona, ā, kua wetekina iho i tēnei here mau tonu o te mate, ko taua matenga he matenga tīnana.

14 Kātahi ka puta mai te whakawākanga o te Mea Tapu ki runga i a rātou; kātahi ka puta mai te wā e poke tonu ai te mea e poke ana; ā, e tika tonu ai te mea e tika ana; e hari tonu ai te mea e hari ana; ā, e pōuri tonu ai te mea e pōuri ana.

15 Ināianei ā, E koutou katoa kua whakaarohia ake e koutou anō tētahi atua tē taea te mahi merekara, ka ui atu au ki a koutou, kua pahemo atu ēnei mea katoa, kua kōrerotia nei? Kua tae mai te mutunga? Nana ko taku kupu tēnei ki a koutou, Kāo; ā, kāore anō te Atua kia mutu hei Atua mahi merekara.

16 Nana, ehara rānei ngā mea i meatia nei e te Atua i te mea whakamīharo i ō koutou karu? Āe rā, ko wai e taea te mārama ngā mahinga whakamīharo a te Atua?

17 Ko wai e kī ake ai ehara i te merekara te putanga ake o te rangi me te whenua i runga tana kupu; ā, nā te kaha o tana kupu hangaia ai te tangata mai i te puehu o te whenua; ā, nā te kaha o tana kupu kua meatia ngā merekara?

18 Ā, ko wai e kī ake ai kāore a Ihu Karaiti i mea ai i ngā merekara maha? Ā, he maha ngā merekara nunui i meatia ai e ngā ringaringa o ngā āpōtoro.

19 Ā, mehemea i mea ai ētahi merekara, nā, he aha i mutu ai i te Atua hei Atua mahi merekara, heoi, he Mea panoni kore tonu? Ā nana, ko taku kupu tēnei ki a koutou kāore ia e panoni; mehemea i pērā kua mutu ia hei Atua; ā, kāore ia e mutu hei Atua, ā, he Atua mahi merekara ia.

20 Ā, ko te take e mutu ai āna mahi merekara i waenganui i ngā tamariki a te tangata he mea nā tō rātou whakaponokore, ā, ka māwehe atu i te huarahi tika, ā, kāore e mōhio ana ki te Atua hei whakawhirinakitanga mō rātou.

21 Nana, ko taku kupu tēnei ki a koutou, ko te tangata e whakapono ana i te Karaiti, kāore e rangirua ana, ka tukuna atu ki a ia ērā mea katoa e tonoa ai e ia ki te Matua i runga i te ingoa o te Karaiti; ā, koinei te whakaari ki a koutou katoa, ki ngā tōpito katoa anō o te ao.

22 Nana rā, pēnei tā Ihu Karaiti kī, te Tama a te Atua, ki āna apataki e noho mai ai, āe rā, ki āna apataki katoa anō hoki, i te rongonga o te whakaminenga: Haere koutou ki te ao katoa, ā, kauhautia atu te rongopai ki ngā mea katoa;

23 Ā, ka whakaorangia te tangata e whakapono ai, ā, e rumakina ai, engari ka pāpunitia te tangata e kore nei e whakapono;

24 Ā, ka whai atu ēnei tohu i te hunga whakapono—ka peia atu rātou i ngā rēwera i runga i tōku ingoa; ka kōrero rātou i ngā reo hou; ka tango ake rātou i ngā nākahi; ā, ki te inu ake rātou i ngā mea whakamate tangata e kore rātou e tūkinotia; ā, ka whakapā i ō rātou ringaringa ki runga i te hunga tūroro, ā, ka ora;

25 Ā, ko te tangata e whakapono ai i tōku ingoa, kāore e rangirua ana, ka whakaū atu au ki a ia aku kupu katoa, tae atu ana ki ngā tōpito katoa o te ao.

26 Ināianei ā, nana, ko wai e taea te tū atu ki ngā mahinga a te Ariki? Ko wai e taea te whakakore i āna kōrero? Ko wai e tū atu ki te mana nui o te Ariki? Ko wai e whakahāwea i ngā mahinga a te Ariki? Ko wai e whakahāwea i ngā tamariki a te Karaiti? Nana, ka mīharo koutou, ā, ka ngaro koutou katoa te hunga whakahāwea i ngā mahinga a te Ariki.

27 Kāti rā, kaua e whakahāwea, kaua e mīharo, engari whakarongo ki ngā kupu a te Ariki, ā, uia atu te Matua i runga i te ingoa o Ihu mō ngā mea katoa e hapa ana koutou. Kaua e rangirua, engari kia kaha te whakapono, ā, kia tīmata pērā i ngā wā onamata, ā, kia haere mai ki te Ariki i runga i tō ngākau katoa, ā, whakamahia tō ake whakaoranga i runga i te wehi me te wiriwiri i tōna aroaro.

28 Kia matatau i roto i ngā rā o tō koutou whakamātautauranga; tīhoretia iho i a koutou ngā mea poke katoa; kaua e ui atu, kia taea ai e koutou te whakapau i ō koutou mate kanehe, engari ui atu i runga i te kaha toka tū moana, kia kore ai koutou e tuku i tētahi whakawainga, engari kia mahi koutou ki te Atua pono, ki te Atua e ora ana.

29 Me titiro koutou kei rumakina koutou i runga i te hē; titiro kei kai i te hakarameta o te Karaiti i runga i te hē; engari titiro kia mahia ēnei mea katoa i runga i te tika, ā, mahia ēnā i runga i te ingoa o Ihu Karaiti, te Tama a te Atua e ora ana; ā, ki te pēnei koutou, me te ū ki te mutunga, e kore nei koutou e makaia ki waho.

30 Nana, e kōrero ana au ki a koutou me te mea nei kei te kōrero au mai i te hunga mate; nā te mea e mōhio ana ahau ka riro i a koutou aku kupu.

31 Kaua e whakahē i a ahau nā ōku ngoikoretanga, i tōku matua rānei, nā ōna ngoikoretanga, i a rātou anō rānei te hunga kua tuhia i mua i a ia; engari me tuku whakawhetai kē koutou ki te Atua mōna ō mātou ngoikoretanga i whakakite atu ai ki a koutou, kia ako koutou me pēhea e mātau ake i a mātou.

32 Ināianei ā, nana, kua tuhia tēnei tuhinga e mātou e hāngai ana ki ō mātou mātauranga, i roto i ngā pū e karangatia nei i waenganui i a mātou ko te Ihipiana rerekē, he mea tuku iho, ā, he mea tīni e mātou, e rite ana ki te āhuatanga o te kōrero.

33 Ā, mehemea i rite te nui o ā mātou papa kua tuhia iho i te reo Hiperu; engari kua tīnia anōtia te reo Hīperu e mātou anō hoki; ā, me i taea e mātou te tuhi i te reo Hīperu, nana, kua kore he ngoikoretanga i roto i tō mātou tuhinga.

34 Engari e mōhio ana te Ariki ki ngā mea kua tuhituhi, waihoki kāore he iwi atu anō e mōhio ana ki tō mātou reo; ā, nā te mea kāore he iwi atu anō e mōhio ana ki tō mātou reo, nō reira ia whakarite ai he huarahi mō tōna whakamāoritanga.

35 Ā, kua tuhia ēnei mea katoa kia mā ai i a mātou ō mātou kākahu i ngā toto o ō mātou tuakana, ko rātou nei kua memeha atu i runga i te whakaponokore.

36 Ā nana, koinei mea kua manakohia mai e koutou e pā ana ki ō mātou tuakana, āe rā, ko tā rātou whakahokinga pū anō ki te mātauranga o te Karaiti, he mea e rite ana ki ngā inoi o te hunga tapu katoa kua noho i te whenua.

37 Ā, mā te Ariki a Ihu Karaiti e tuku kia whakautua ā rātou inoi e rite ana ki tō rātou whakapono; ā, mā te Atua te Matua e mahara ki te kawenata i kawenata ai ia ki te whare o Iharaira; ā, māna rātou e manaaki mō āke tonu atu, mā roto i te whakapono i runga i te ingoa o Ihu Karaiti. Āmine.
ether 1:
[center][font_size=26]Ko te Pukapuka a Ētere[/font_size][/center]

Ko te tuhinga mō ngā Iarere, kua tīkina atu i ngā papa rua tekau-mā whā i kitea ai e te iwi o Rimihii ngā rā o Kīngi Mōhia.

[center][font_size=26]Upoko 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ka whakarāpopoto a Moronai i ngā tuhituhinga a Ētere—Ka whakatakotohia iho ngā whakapapa o Ētere—Kīhai te reo o ngā Iarere i whakapōauautia i te pourewa o Pāpera—Ka whakaaria e te Ariki kia ārahina atu rātou ki tētahi whenua taurikura, ā, ka whakatupuria rātou hei iwi nui.[/i]

1 Ināianei ka tīmata ahau, a Moronai, ki te tuku i tētahi tuhinga mō aua tangata whenua onamata i whakangaromia e te ringa o te Ariki i runga i te mata o tēnei whenua.

2 Ā, ka tīkina mai taku tuhinga mai i ngā papa e rua tekau mā whā i kitea rā e te iwi o Rimihi, i karangatia nei ko te Pukapuka a Ētere.

3 Ā, ki ōku whakaaro kei ngā Hūrai te wāhanga tuatahi o tēnei tuhinga, e kōrero ana e pā ana ki te hanganga rā anō o te ao, mō Arama anō hoki, ā, he tuhinga anō mai i tērā wā tae noa iho ki te pourewa nui, me ngā mea katoa i heipū ake nei i waenganui i ngā tamariki a te tangata tae noa ki taua wā.

4 Nō reira kāore au e tuhituhi i aua mea i heipū ake nei mai i ngā rā o Arama tae noa ki taua wā; engari kei runga i ngā papa; ā, ko te tangata e kitea ai ērā mea, ko ia anō te mea e whaimana ana kia riro i a ia te roanga katoa o te tuhinga.

5 Engari nana, Kāore au e tuku i te roanga katoa o te tuhinga, engari ka tuku au i tētahi wāhi o te tuhinga, mai i te pourewa tae noa iho ki te wā i whakangaromia ai rātou.

6 Ā, ka pēnei taku tuhituhi i runga i tēnei āhuatanga. Ko te tangata nāna nei tēnei tuhinga i tuhituhi, arā, ko Ētere, ā, he uri ia nō Koriatoro.

7 He tama a Koriatoro nā Morono.

8 Ā, he tama a Morono nā Eteme.

9 Ā, he tama a Eteme nā Ahaha.

10 Ā, he tama a Ahaha nā Heta.

11 Ā, he tama a Heta nā Hipirona.

12 Ā, he tama a Hipirona nā Koma.

13 Ā, he tama a Koma nā Koriatumu.

14 Ā, he tama a Koriatumu nā Amanikara.

15 Ā, he tama a Amanikara nā Arona.

16 Ā, he uri a Arona nō Hete, he tama ia nā Heatomo.

17 Ā, he tama a Heatomo nā Ripi.

18 Ā, he tama a Ripi nā Kihi.

19 Ā, he tama a Kihi nā Koroma.

20 Ā, he tama a Koroma nā Rewi.

21 Ā, he tama a Rewi nā Kimi.

22 Ā, he tama a Kimi nā Moriatono.

23 Ā, he uri a Moriatono nō Ripakihi.

24 Ā, he tama a Ripakihi nā Heha.

25 Ā, he tama a Heha nā Hete.

26 Ā, he tama a Hete nā Koma.

27 Ā, he tama a Koma nā Koriatumu.

28 He tama a Koriatumu nā Emera.

29 Ā, he tama a Emera nā Omere.

30 Ā, ko Omere te tama nā Hure.

31 Ā, he tama a Hure nā Kipi.

32 Ā, he tama a Kipi nā Oriha, he tama ia nā Iarere;

33 Ko taua Iarere i haere mai ai i te pourewa nui, rāua ko tana teina, me ō rāua whānau, me ētahi atu me ō rātou whānau, i te wā i whakapōauau te Ariki i te reo o te iwi, ā, ka oati i runga i tōna riri kia whakamararatia atu rātou i runga i te mata katoa o te whenua; ā, i whakamararatia atu te iwi e rite ana ki te kupu a te Ariki.

34 I te mea he tangata kaitā te teina a Iarere, ā, he tangata i whakamakautia nuitia e te Ariki, ka kī ake a Iarere, tana tuakana ki a ia: Karanga ake ki te Ariki, kia kaua rā ia e whakapōauau i a tātou kei kore tātou e mārama ki ā tātou kupu.

35 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka karanga ake te teina a Iarere ki te Ariki, ā, ka aroha te Ariki ki a Iarere; nō reira kāore ia i whakapōauau i te reo o Iarere; ā, kāore a Iarere rāua ko tana teina i whakapōauautia.

36 Kātahi a Iarere ka kī atu ki tana teina: Karanga ake anō ki te Ariki, e tahuri atu ai ia i tōna riri i te hunga ko rātou nei he hoa nō tāua, kei kore ia e whakapōauau i tō rātou reo.

37 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka karanga ake te teina a Iarere ki te Ariki, ā, ka aroha anō te Ariki ki ō rāua hoa me ō rātou whānau anō hoki, nā, kāore rātou i whakapōauautia.

38 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka kōrero atu anō a Iarere ki tana teina, e mea ana: Haere, ā, ui atu ki te Ariki mēnā rānei ka āia atu tātou e ia ki waho i te whenua, ā, mēnā rānei ka āia atu tātou e ia ki waho i te whenua, karanga ake ki a ia ko hea haere ai tātou. Ā, ko wai e mōhio ana ko hea tātou kawea atu ai e te Ariki ki tētahi whenua e pai ake nei i ngā whenua katoa? Ā, ki te pēnei, tukua tātou kia ū ki te Ariki, kia whiwhi ai tātou ki taua mea hei whenua tuku iho mō tātou.

39 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka karanga ake te teina a Iarere ki te Ariki e rite ana ki taua mea i kōrerotia nei e te māngai o Iarere.

40 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka rongo te Ariki i te teina o Iarere, ā, ka aroha ia ki a ia, ā, ka kī ake ia ki a ia:

41 Me haere me te whakawhāiti ngātahi i ā koutou kāhui, toa mai, uwha mai o ia āhua o ia āhua; i ngā kākano o te whenua anō hoki o ia āhua, o ia āhua; me ō whānau; me Iarere tō tuakana anō hoki me tōna whānau; me ō hoa anō hoki me ō rātou whānau, me ngā hoa o Iarere me ō rātou whānau.

42 Ā, ina oti i a koe tēnei mea ka haere iho koe i mua i a rātou ki roto i te raorao kei te raki. Ā, ka tūtaki au ki a koe i reira, ā, ka haere atu au i mua i a koe ki roto i tētahi whenua e pai ake ana i ngā whenua katoa o te ao.

43 Ā, ka manaaki au i a koe i reira me ōu uri, ā, ka whakatupuria ake he iwi nui mōku i ōu uri, i ngā uri anō o tō tuakana, ā, ka haere ngātahi rātou me koe. Ā, kāore tētahi iwi nui ake i te iwi māku e whakatupu ake i ōu uri, i runga i te mata katoa o te whenua. Ā pēnei tāku ki a koe nā te mea kua roa te wā kua karanga ake nei koe ki ahau.
ether 2:
[center][font_size=26]Upoko 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ka whakarite ngā Iarere mō tō rātou haerenga ki tētahi whenua whakaari—He whenua taurikura e tika ana i reira kia mahi te tangata ki te Karaiti ki te kore ka tahia atu—Ka kōrero atu te Ariki ki te teina a Iarere mō ngā hāora e toru—Ka waihanga ngā Iarere i ngā kaipuke nui—Ka ui atu te Ariki i te teina a Iarere kia whakaarohia ake tētahi huarahi e whakatūramatia ngā kaipuke.[/i]

1 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka haere iho a Iarere rātou ko tana teina, me ō rāua whānau, me ngā hoa anō hoki o Iarere rāua ko tana teina me ō rātou whānau, ki roto i te raorao whakateraki, (ā, ko Nimirota te ingoa o te raorao, he mea huaina mō te kaiaru kararehe kaha) me ā rātou kāhui i whakawhāitihia nei e rātou, toa mai, uwha mai, o ia āhua, o ia āhua.

2 Ā, ka whakatakoto anō rātou i ngā māhanga, ā, ka hopu i ngā manu o te rangi; ā, ka whakarite anō rātou i tētahi oko, i mau ai i a rātou ngā ika nō ngā wai.

3 Ā, ka mau mai anō i a rātou he tehoreta, koia, ko tōna whakamāoritanga, he pī mīere; ā, pēnei tā rātou kawe mai i a rātou ngā heke pī, me ngā āhua katoa o ngā mea i runga i te mata o te whenua, ngā purapura o ia āhua katoa.

4 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, i te wā i heke iho ai rātou ki roto i te raorao o Nimirota ka heke iho te Ariki ki raro, ā, ka kōrero tahi me te teina a Iarere; ā, kei roto ia i tētahi kapua, ā, kāore te teina a Iarere i kite atu i a ia.

5 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whakahau te Ariki i a rātou kia haere atu rātou ki roto i te koraha, āe rā, ki roto ki taua takiwā kāore anō kia tae atu te tangata i reira. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka haere atu te Ariki i mua i a rātou, ā, ka kōrero tahi me rātou i a ia e tū ana i tētahi kapua, ā, ka tuku tohutohu ko hea haere ai rātou.

6 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka haere rātou i roto i te koraha, ā, ka waihanga kaipuke, nā konā whakawhiti atu rātou i ngā wai maha, e tohua tonutia ana e te ringa o te Ariki.

7 Ā, kāore te Ariki i tuku kia noho rātou i tua atu i te moana i te koraha, engari i hiahia ia kia haere mai ai rātou tae noa ki te whenua i whakaaria, he mea pai ake i ērā atu whenua katoa, kua tiakina mai nei e te Ariki te Atua mō tētahi iwi tika.

8 Ā, i oati anō hoki ia i runga i tōna riri ki te teina o Iarere, nā, me mahi te tangata e noho mai nei i tēnei whenua i whakaaria, atu i taua wā haere ake nei, ā, mō āke tonu atu, ki te Atua kotahi, ka tahia atu rātou rānei ina puta mai te raneatanga o tōna riri ki runga i a rātou.

9 Ināianei ā, ka taea e tātou te kite i ngā tikanga whakatakoto a te Atua e pā ana ki tēnei whenua, nā, he whenua tēnei nā te kupu whakaari; ka mahi te iwi e nōhia ai taua whenua ki te Atua, ka tahia atu rātou rānei ina puta mai te raneatanga o tōna riri ki runga i a rātou. Ā, ka puta mai te raneatanga o tōna riri ki runga i a rātou ina pakari tō rātou kino.

10 Nana rā, he whenua tēnei e pai ake ana i ērā atu whenua katoa; nā reira me mahi te tangata e nōhia nei te whenua ki te Atua, ka tahia atu rānei; nā te mea koinā te tikanga takoto mutunga kore a te Atua. Ā, kāore rātou e tahia atu kia puta mai te raneatanga o te kino i waenganui i ngā tamariki o te whenua.

11 Ā, ka puta mai tēnei ki a koutou, E koutou e ngā Tauiwi, kia mōhio ai koutou ki ngā tikanga whakatakoto a te Atua—kia rīpenetā ai koutou, ā, kei kore koutou e haere tonu atu i runga i ō koutou kino kia puta rā anō mai te raneatanga, kei kore koutou e tō iho mai i te raneatanga o te riri o te Atua ki runga i a koutou pēnā i ngā tāngata whenua i mea ai i mua.

12 Nana, he whenua taurikura tēnei, ka herekore te iwi e nōhia nei e rātou tēnei whenua i te hereheretanga, me te mauheretanga, mai i ngā iwi katoa i raro i te rangi, ki te mahi noa rātou ki te Atua o te whenua, ko Ihu Karaiti ia, kua whakakitea mai nei e ngā mea kua tuhia mai nei e mātou.

13 Ināianei ā, ka haere tonu taku tuhituhinga; nana rā, i pahawa ake, nā, i kawe mai nei te Ariki i a Iarere rāua ko tana teina ki te moana nui pū anō e whakawehewehe nei i ngā whenua. Ā, ka whakatūria ō rātou tēneti i tā rātou taenga atu ki te moana; ā, ka karangatia ake e rātou te wāhi rā ko Morianakumere; ā, ka noho tēneti rātou, ā, ka noho tēneti rātou i te takutai moana mō te takiwā o ngā tau e whā.

14 Ā, i pahawa ake i te mutunga o ngā tau e whā, nā, ka haere mai anō te Ariki ki te teina o Iarere, ā, ka tū i tētahi kapua, ā, ka kōrero tahi me ia. Ā, ka kōrero tahi te Ariki ki te teina a Iarere mō te takiwā o ngā hāora e toru, ā, ka kohetehia ia nā te mea kīhai ia i mahara ki te karanga ake ki te ingoa o te Ariki.

15 Ā, ka rīpenetā te teina a Iarere mō te kino i mea ai ia, ā, ka karanga ake ki te ingoa o te Ariki mō ana teina i tōna taha. Ā, ka kī atu te Ariki ki a ia: ka muru au i a koutou ko ō teina i ō koutou hara; engari kaua koutou e hara tonu anō, nā te mea ka mahara koutou e kore taku Wairua e totohe tonu ki te tangata; nā reira, ki te hara koutou kia pakari rawa koutou ka hātepea atu koutou i te aroaro o te Ariki. Ā, koinei ōku whakaaro mō te whenua e hoatu nei e au ki a koutou hei whenua tuku iho mō koutou; nā te mea ka meinga hoki tērā hei whenua e pai ake ana i ērā atu whenua katoa.

16 Ā, ka kī ake te Ariki: Me haere ki te mahi, ā, hangaia, i runga i te ritenga o ngā kaipuke kua hangaia i mua. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka haere te teina a Iarere ki te mahi, me ana teina anō hoki, ā, ka waihanga kaipuke i runga i te ritenga o ngā mea i hangaia ai e rātou i mua, e rite ana ki ngā tohutohu a te Ariki. Ā, he mea iti ērā, ā, he mea māmā i runga i te wai, e rite tonu ana ki te māmātanga o tētahi manu i runga i te wai.

17 Ā, i hangaia ērā mea i runga i tētahi ritenga e piri kaha nei ērā, kua taea te mau ki te wai e rite tonu ana ki tētahi ipu; ā, he rite tonu tō reira taha whakararo ki tētahi ipu; ā, he piri kaha tō reira taha whakararo; ā, he piri kaha anō tō reira tahataha e rite ana ki tētahi ipu; ā, he mea koikoi ngā pito; ā, he piri kaha anō tō reira taha whakarunga kia rite tonu ki tētahi ipu; ā, ko tō reira roa he rite tonu ki te roa o tētahi rākau; ā, ko tō reira tatau, i te wā kua katia, he piri kaha kia rite tonu ki tētahi ipu.

18 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka karanga ake te teina a Iarere ki te Ariki, e mea ana: E te Atua, kua meatia e au ngā mahi nāu anō i whakahau mai ki ahau, ā, kua hangaia ngā kaipuke kia rite ki tāu i tohutohu mai nei.

19 Ā nana, E te Ariki, kāore he māramatanga kei roto i aua mea; me urungi atu mātou ki hea? Waihoki ka mate mātou, nā te mea kāore e taea te ngā, hāunga ko te hau kei roto rā; nō reira ka mate mātou.

20 Ā, ka kī atu te Ariki ki te teina a Iarere: Nana, māu e hanga tētahi koroputa i te taha whakarunga, me te taha whakararo anō hoki; ā, ina mate koutou i te haukore ka whakatūwhera i te koroputa, ā, ka whaihau. Ā, ki te rere iho mai te wai ki runga i a koutou, nana, ka katia te koroputa, kia kore koutou e mate i te waipuke.

21 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka meatia e te teina a Iarere, e rite ana ki tā te Ariki i whakahau ai.

22 Ā, ka karanga ake anō ia ki te Ariki e mea ana: E te Ariki, nana kua mea au i tāu i whakahau mai ki ahau; ā, kua whakarite au i ngā kaipuke mō tōku iwi, ā nana kāore he tūramatanga kei roto rā. Nana, E te Ariki, māu rā e tuku kia whakawhiti atu mātou i te wai nui i roto i te pōuritanga?

23 Ā, ka kī atu te Ariki ki te teina a Iarere: He aha tāu e pai ai hei meatanga māku kia whai māramatanga i roto i ō koutou kaipuke? Nana rā, kāore e āhei ana i a koutou te whai matapihi, nā te mea ka pākarukaru hoki ēnā; kāore rānei koutou e hari ahi atu, nā te mea e kore koutou e haere atu i runga i te māramatanga o te ahi.

24 Nana rā, ka rite koutou ki tētahi tohorā i roto i te moana; nā te mea ka akiaki ngā ngaru maunga ki runga i a koutou. Hei aha koa, māku koutou e whakaputa ake anō i ngā hōhonutanga o te moana; nā te mea kua rere atu ngā hau i tōku māngai, ā, nāku anō ngā ua me ngā waipuke i tuku atu.

25 Ā nana, ka whakarite au i a koutou mō ēnei mea; nā te mea e kore nei e āhei i a koutou te whakawhiti atu i tēnei hōhonutanga nui ki te kore au e whakarite i a koutou mō ngā ngaru o te moana, ā, ko ngā hau kua rere atu, me ngā waipuke e puta mai ai. Nō reira he aha tāu e pai ai hei whakaritenga māku kia whai māramatanga ina horomia ake koutou i ngā hōhonutanga o te moana?
ether 3:
[center][font_size=26]Upoko 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ka kite te teina a Iarere i te matikara o te Ariki i a ia e pā iho ana ki ngā kohatu tekau mā rua—Ka whakakite atu te Karaiti i Tōna tīnana wairua ki te teina a Iarere—Kāore e taea te hunga i a rātou tētahi mātauranga tino tika te aukati i tā rātou tomo atu i te ārai—Ka tukuna he mea whakamāori hei whakaputa atu i te tuhinga Iarere ki te māramatanga.[/i]

1 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka haere atu te teina a Iarere, (nā kua whakaritea ngā kaipuke e waru) ki te maunga, i karangatia nei e rātou ko te maunga Hereme, nā tōna tino tiketike, ā, ka rewa mai i tētahi kohatu ngā kohatu iti tekau mā ono; he mea mā, ā, he mea pūataata, he rite tōna pūataata anō ki te karāhe; ā, nāna i hari i roto i ōna ringaringa ki runga i te tihi o te maunga, ā, ka karanga ake anō ki te Ariki, e mea ana:

2 E te Ariki, nāu nei i mea mai e tika ana kia karapotia mātou e ngā waipuke. Nana ināianei, E te Ariki, kia kaua e riri ki tāu pononga nā tōna ngoikoretanga i tō aroaro; nā te mea e mōhio ana mātou he tapu koe, ā, e noho ana i ngā rangi, ā, he mea hē mātou i tō aroaro; kua huri ō mātou āhua kia kino tonu he mea nā te takanga; hei aha koa, E te Ariki, kua homai e koe tētahi whakahaunga e mea ana me karanga ake mātou ki a koe, kia whiwhi mātou i a koe e rite ana ki ō mātou hiahia.

3 Nana, E te Ariki, kua pākia mātou e koe mō tō mātou hē, ā, kua āia atu mātou, ā, kua noho mātou i roto i te koraha mō ēnei tau maha; hei aha koa, kua arohaina mātou e koe. E te Ariki, tirohia iho au i runga i te aroha, ā, tahuritia atu tō riri i tēnei tō iwi, ā, kaua rā e tukua kia whakawhiti atu rātou i ngā rire hikareia i roto i te pōuritanga; engari tirohia ēnei mea kua whakarewaina iho e au i te kohatu.

4 Ā, e mōhio ana ahau, E te Ariki, kei a koe te kaha katoa, ā, e taea ana tāu e pai ai mō te oranga o te tangata; nō reira whakapāngia mai ēnei kohatu, E te Ariki, ki tōu matikara, ā, whakaritea ērā kia tīahoaho atu i roto i te pōuritanga; ā, ka tīahoaho atu ērā ki a mātou i roto i ngā kaipuke kua whakaritea nei e mātou, kia whai māramatanga mātou i a mātou e whakawhiti atu ana i te moana.

5 Nana, E te Ariki, e taea ana e koe tēnei te mahi. E mōhio ana mātou e taea ana e koe te whakakite atu i te kaha nui, he mea iti ki tō te tangata māramatanga.

6 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, i te kōrerotanga ake o te teina a Iarere i ēnei kupu, nana, ka torona atu e te Ariki tōna ringa, ā, ka pā takitahi iho ki ngā kohatu ki tōna matikara. Ā, ka hīkina ake te ārai i ngā karu o te teina a Iarere, ā, ka kite ia i te matikara o te Ariki; ā, i rite ki tō te tangata matikara, he rite ki te kikokiko me te toto; ā, ka hinga iho te teina a Iarere i te aroaro o te Ariki, nā te mea kua pākia ia ki te wehi.

7 Ā, ka kite te Ariki kua hinga iho te teina a Iarere ki te whenua; ā, ka kī atu te Ariki ki a ia: E mātika ake, he aha koe i hinga iho ai?

8 Ā, ka kī atu ia ki te Ariki: I kite au i te matikara o te Ariki, ā, i wehi au kei pākia iho au; nā te mea kāore au i te mōhio he kikokiko, he toto tō te Ariki.

9 Ā, ka kī atu te Ariki ki a ia: Nā tō whakapono kua kite koe, nā, ka tangohia ake ki runga ki ahau te kikokiko me te toto; ā, kāore anō te tangata kia haere mai ki mua i ahau i runga i te whakapono nui pēnei i a koe; nā te mea me i kore i pēnā kua kore i taea e koe te kite i tōku matikara. I nui atu rānei tāu i kite ai?

10 Ā, ka whakautu ia: Kāo; e te Ariki, whakakite mai koe i a koe anō ki ahau.

11 Ā, ka kī atu te Ariki ki a ia: E whakapono ana rānei koe ki ngā kupu e kōrerotia ai e au?

12 Ā, ka whakautu ia: Āe rā, e te Ariki, e mōhio ana au kei te kōrero pono koe, nā te mea he Atua pono koe, kāore e taea ana e koe te kōrero teka.

13 Ā, i tana kōrerotanga i ēnei kupu, nana, ka whakakite atu te Ariki i a ia anō ki a ia, ā, ka mea: Kua hokona mai koe i te takanga nā te mea kei te mōhio koe ki ēnei mea; nō reira kua whakahokia mai koe ki tōku aroaro; nō reira au whakakite atu ai i ahau anō ki a koe.

14 Nana, ko au anō tērā i whakaritea ai i te orokohanganga rā o te ao ki te hoko i tōku iwi. Nana, Ko au a Ihu Karaiti. Ko au te Matua me te Tama. Ka whaioranga ngā tāngata katoa i ahau, ā, ki te taha mau tonu, ka meinga rātou te hunga e whakapono ai ki tōku ingoa hei tama, ā, hei tamāhine māku.

15 Ā, kāore anō au kia whakakite atu i a au anō ki te tangata nāku noa nei i hanga, nā te mea kāore anō te tangata kia whakapono mai pērā i a koe. E kite ana koe he mea hanga koe ki te ritenga o tōku ake āhua? Āe rā, i hangaia ngā tāngata katoa i te tīmatanga ki te ritenga o tōku ake āhua.

16 Nana, tēnei tīnana, e kitea nei e koe, koia te tīnana o tōku wairua; ā, kua hangaia e au te tangata ki te ritenga o te tīnana o tōku wairua; ā, me au nei e kitea nei e koe i roto i te wairua waihoki ka pērā anō hoki taku putanga mai ki tōku iwi i roto i te kikokiko.

17 Ināianei ā, he pērā i ahau, a Moronai, i kī ake e kore e taea e au te hanga ake i tētahi tuhinga whānui mō ēnei mea kua tuhia iho nei, nō reira kāti anō māku te kī ake, nā, i whakakite a Ihu i a ia anō ki tēnei tangata i roto i te wairua, i runga i te āhua me te ritenga o taua tīnana anō i whakakitea atu ai ia e ia anō ki ngā Nīwhai.

18 Ā, i minita atu ia ki a ia pērā i tana minitatanga atu ki ngā Nīwhai; ā, koinei katoa, kia mōhio ai tēnei tangata ko ia te Atua, nā ngā mahinga maha i whakakite atu ai te Ariki ki a ia.

19 Ā, nō te mātauranga o tēnei tangata kāore i taea te taupare atu i tana titiro ki roto i te ārai; ā, i kite ia i te matikara o Ihu, nā konei, i tana kitenga atu, ka hinga iho ia i te wehi; nā te mea i mōhio ia koia te matikara o te Ariki; ā, mutu tonu atu tōna whakapono, nā te mea i mōhio ia, kāore hoki ōna rangirua.

20 Nā reira, i a ia tēnei mātauranga tika rawa atu mō te Atua, kāore ia i taea te taupare atu i tana titiro atu ki roto i te ārai; nō reira i kite ia i a Ihu; ā, i minita atu ia ki a ia.

21 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka kī ake te Ariki ki te teina a Iarere: Nana, e kore koe e tukuna kia puta atu ēnei mea kua kitea nei, ā, kua rangona e koe ki te ao, kia tae ki te wā e whakakorōria au i tōku ingoa i roto i te kikokiko; nā reira, ka pupuri ake koe ki ngā mea kua kitea nei, ā, kua rangona e koe, ā, kei noho ka whakakitea atu ki tētahi tangata.

22 Ā nana, ina haere mai koe ki ahau, māu ēnā mea e tuhituhi, ā, māu anō ēnā mea e hīri ake, kia kore ai tētahi e whakamāoritia ēnā mea; nā te mea māu ēnā mea e tuhituhi i roto i tētahi reo e kore nei e taea e rātou te pānui.

23 Ā nana, māku ēnei kohatu e rua e hoatu ki a koe, ā, māu anō ēnā e hīri tahi ake ki te taha o aua mea e tuhia ai e koe.

24 Nana rā, kua whakapōauautia e au te reo e tuhia ai e koe; nā reira ka mea au a tōna ake anō wā e pai ai ki ahau, kia whakanuia e ēnei kohatu ki ngā karu o te tangata ēnei mea e tuhia ai e koe.

25 Ā, i te kōrerotanga ake o te Ariki i ēnei kupu, ka whakakite atu ia ki te teina a Iarere ngā tangata whenua katoa i ora ai, me ngā mea anō hoki e ora ai; ā, kīhai ia i taupare atu i ēnā mea i tana tirohanga atu, tae atu pū anō ki ngā pito o te ao.

26 Nā te mea kua kōrero atu ia ki a ia i ngā wā o mua, nā, mehemea ka whakapono ia ki a ia ka taea e ia ngā mea katoa te whakakite atu ki a ia—me whakakite atu i aua mea ki a ia; nō reira kāore i taea e te Atua te kaiponu i tētahi mea i a ia, nā te mea i mōhio ia e āhei anō i te Ariki te whakakite atu i ngā mea katoa ki a ia.

27 Ā, ka kī atu te Ariki ki a ia: Tuhia ēnei mea, ā, hīria ake ērā; ā, māku e whakakite atu i tōku ake wā ki ngā tamariki a te tangata.

28 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whakahau te Ariki ki a ia kia hīria ake ngā kohatu e rua kua whiwhi nei ia, ā, kei whakakitea atu, taka noa ki te wā e whakakitea atu ai e te Ariki aua mea ki ngā tamariki a te tangata.
ether 4:
[center][font_size=26]Upoko 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ka whakahaua a Moronai kia hīria ake ngā tuhinga a te teina a Iarere—E kore aua mea e whakakitea ake kia pērā te nui o tō te tangata whakapono i tō te teina a Iarere—Ka whakahau te Karaiti i te tangata kia whakapono ki Āna kupu me ērā anō a Āna apataki—Ka whakahaua te tangata kia rīpenetā, kia whakapono ki te rongopai, ā, kia whakaorangia.[/i]

1 Ā, ka whakahau te Ariki i te teina a Iarere kia heke iho i te maunga i te aroaro o te Ariki, ā, kia tuhia ngā mea i kitea ai e ia; ā, i kīa kia kaua e puta atu ērā mea ki ngā tamariki a te tangata kia whakairia ake rā anō ia i te rīpeka; ā, mō tēnei take puritia ai ērā mea e kīngi Mōhia, kia kore ai e puta atu ki te ao kia whakakite rā anō te Karaiti i a ia anō ki tana iwi.

2 Ā, whai muri iho i tā te Karaiti tino whakakite atu i a ia anō ki tana iwi ka whakahau ia kia whakaputaina ērā mea.

3 Ināianei ā, whai muri iho i tērā, kua memeha atu rātou i te whakapono kore; ā, kāore tētahi hāunga ko ngā Rāmana, ā, kua whakaparahako rātou i te rongopai a te Karaiti; nō reira kua whakahaua au kia hunaia ake anō ērā mea ki roto i te whenua.

4 Nana, kua tuhituhi au ki runga i ēnei papa ngā mea pū anō i kite ai te teina a Iarere; ā, kāore he mea e nui ake ana i ngā mea i whakakitea atu ai ki te teina a Iarere.

5 Nā reira kua whakahau te Ariki ki ahau kia tuhia ērā mea; ā, nāku ērā mea i tuhituhi. Ā, i whakahau ia ki ahau kia hīria ake ērā mea; ā, i whakahau anō hoki ia ki ahau kia hīria ake anō tō reira whakamāoritanga; nā reira nāku ngā mea whakamāori i hīri ake, e rite ana ki te whakahau a te Ariki.

6 Nā te mea i kī mai te Ariki ki ahau: E kore ērā mea e puta atu ki ngā Tauiwi kia tae ki te rā e rīpenetā ai rātou i ō rātou hara, ā, kia meinga hei mea mā i te aroaro o te Ariki.

7 Ā, hei taua rā e whakapakari rātou i tō rātou whakapono ki a au, e ai tā te Ariki, e pērā pū anō i tā te teina a Iarere, kia meinga rātou hei mea whakatapua i roto i ahau, kātahi au ka whakakite atu i ngā mea i kite ai te teina a Iarere, tae atu ana ki te huranga ake ki a rātou aku whakakitenga katoa, e ai tā Ihu Karaiti, te Tama a te Atua, te Matua o ngā rangi me te whenua, me ngā mea katoa kei roto rā.

8 Ā, tukua te tangata e tautohetohe ai ki te kupu a te Ariki kia kangaia; ā, tukua anō te tangata e whakakore nei i ēnei mea kia kangaia; nā te mea e kore au e whakakite atu ki a rātou ngā mea nui ake, e ai tā Ihu Karaiti; nā te mea ko au anō ia e kōrero nei.

9 Ā, i taku whakahau iho ka puare noa, ā, ka kati noa ngā rangi; ā, i taku kupu ka tūoioi te whenua; ā, i taku whakahau iho ka pahemo atu tō reira tāngata, me te mea nei nā te ahi.

10 Ā, ko te tangata e kore nei e whakapono ki aku kupu, kāore nei e whakapono ana ki ngā kupu a aku apataki; ā, mehemea kāore au i te kōrero, whakawākia e koutou; nā te mea ka mōhio koutou ko au e kōrero ana, hei te rā whakamutunga.

11 Engari ko te tangata e whakapono nei ki ngā mea kua kōrerotia nei e au, māku ia e toro atu ki ngā whakakitenga o tōku wairua, ā, ka mōhio ia, ā, ka whakaatu ia. Nā te mea mā tōku Wairua ia e mōhio ai e pono ana ēnei mea; nā te mea e whakapakepake ana ēnei mea i te tangata kia mahi pai.

12 Ā, nōku ngā mea katoa e whakapakepake nei i te tangata ki te mahi pai; nā te mea kāore e puta mai te pai i tētahi ki te kore i ahau. Ko au anō tērā e ārahi nei i te tangata ki ngā mahi pai katoa; ko te tangata e kore nei e whakapono ki aku kupu e kore nei e whakapono ki ahau—nā, ko au anō tērā; ā, ko te tangata e kore nei e whakapono ki ahau e kore anō e whakapono ki te Matua nāna nei au i tono mai. Nana rā, ko au anō te Matua, ko au anō te māramatanga, me te oranga, me te pono o te ao.

13 Haere mai ki ahau, E koutou e ngā Tauiwi, ā, māku e whakakite atu ki a koutou ngā mea nui ake, ko te mātauranga kua hunaia ake nā te whakaponokore.

14 Haere mai ki ahau, E koutou te whare o Iharaira, ā, ka whakakitea atu tēnā ki a koutou anō te nui o ngā mea kua whakatakotohia ake e te Matua mō koutou, mai i te tūāpapa o te ao; ā, kāore anō kia puta mai ki a koutou, he mea nā te whakapono kore.

15 Nana, ina tihaea e koutou te ārai o te whakapono kore e mea nei i a koutou kia noho tonu ai i tō koutou āhuatanga weriweri o te whakarihariha, me te whakapakeketanga o ō koutou ngākau, me te kāpōtanga o te hinengaro, kātahi ngā mea nui whakamīharo kua hunuia ake i a koutou mai i te tūāpapa o te ao—āe rā, ina karanga ake koutou ki te Matua i runga i tōku ingoa, i runga i te ngākau marū me te wairua iro, kātahi koutou ka mōhio, nā, kua maumahara te Matua i te kawenata i kawenata ai ia ki ō koutou tūpuna, E te whare o Iharaira.

16 Kātahi ka huraina ake aku whakakitenga katoa i mea ai au kia tuhia e taku pononga a Hoani ki ngā karu o te iwi katoa. Kia mahara, ina kite koutou i ēnei mea, ka mōhio koutou kua tata mai te wā e whakakitea atu ai ērā mea i roto pū anō i ngā mahinga.

17 Nō reira, ina whiwhi koutou i tēnei tuhinga ka mōhio koutou kua tīmata te Matua i tana mahi i runga i te mata katoa o te whenua.

18 Nō reira, kia rīpenetā e koutou e ngā tōpito katoa o te ao, ā, haere mai ki ahau, ā, whakapono mai ki taku rongopai, ā, rumakina i runga i tōku ingoa; ā, ka whai mai ngā tohu i te hunga e whakapono ai i tōku ingoa.

19 Ā, kua manaakitia te tangata e kitea ai e ū ana ki tōku ingoa hei te rā whakamutunga, nā te mea ka hāpaingia ake ia kia noho ai i te kīngitanga i whakaritea ai i te tūāpapa o te ao. Ā, nana, ko au anō nāna nei i kōrero. Āmine.
ether 5:
[center][font_size=26]Upoko 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ka tū atu ngā kaiwhakaatu tokotoru me te mahi ake anō hei whakaaturanga mō te pono o te Pukapuka a Moromona.[/i]

1 Ināianei ahau, a Moronai, kua tuhia ngā kupu kua whakahaua nei ahau, e rite ana ki tōku mahara; ā, kua kōrerohia atu e au ki a koutou ngā mea kua hīria ake e au; nō reira kaua e whakapā atu ki ērā mea kia whakamāoritia ai e koutou; nā te mea kua whakahaua koutou kia kaua, engari taihoa ake ka pērātia e te mātauranga o te Atua.

2 Ā nana, tērā pea ka tukua koutou kia whakakite atu i ngā papa ki te hunga e āwhina ai ki te whakaputa i tēnei mahi;

3 Ā, ka whakakitea atu ki tētahi tokotoru e te mana o te Atua; nā reira ka tino mōhio rawa atu rātou he pono ēnei mea.

4 Ā, mā te māngai o ngā kaiwhakaatu tokotoru e whakapūmautia ai ēnei mea; ā, ko te whakaaturanga o te tokotoru, me tēnei mahi, i konā whakakitea atu ai te mana o te Atua me tana kupu anō hoki, e whakaaturia mai nei e te Matua, e te Tama, e te Wairua Tapu anō hoki—ā, ka tū atu ēnei mea katoa hei kaiwhakaatu ki te ao hei te rā whakamutunga.

5 Ā, ki te rīpenetā rātou me te haere mai ki te Matua i runga i te ingoa o Ihu, ka whakawhiwhia rātou ki roto ki te kīngitanga o te Atua.

6 Ināianei ā, mehemea kāore aku mana i runga i ēnei mea, whakawākia e koutou; nā te mea ka mōhio koutou kei ahau te mana ina kite koutou i ahau, ā, ka tū atu tātou i te aroaro o te Atua hei te rā whakamutunga. Āmine.
ether 6:
[center][font_size=26]Upoko 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ka āia ngā kaipuke Iarere e ngā hau ki te whenua o te kupu whakaari—I whakawhetai te iwi ki te Ariki mō Tōna painga—Ka whakatūria a Oriha hei kīngi mō runga i a rātou—Ka mate a Iarere rāua ko tana teina.[/i]

1 Ināianei ahau, a Moronai, ka tuku tonu i te tuhinga a Iarere rāua ko tana teina.

2 Nā te mea i pahawa ake i muri iho i tā te Ariki whakarite i ngā kohatu i kawea ake ai e te teina a Iarere ki runga i te maunga, ka heke iho te teina a Iarere i te maunga, ā, ka purua atu ngā kohatu ki roto i ngā kaipuke i whakaritea atu nei, tētahi ki tētahi pito, tētahi ki tētahi pito; ā nana, i tiaho atu ēnā mea i roto i ngā kaipuke.

3 Ā pēnei meatia ai e te Ariki ngā kohatu kia tiaho atu i te pōuritanga, kia tuku māramatanga atu ki ngā tāne, ngā wāhine, me ngā tamariki, kia kore ai rātou e whakawhiti atu i ngā wai nunui i roto i te pōuritanga.

4 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, i te wā kua whakaritea e rātou ngā tūmomo kai katoa, hei oranga mō rātou i runga i te wai, me ngā kai anō hoki mā ā rātou kāhui o ia tū, o ia tū, me ngā kararehe, ngā manu rānei e haria ai e rātou—ā, i pahawa ake i te wā kua whakaotioti rātou i ēnei mea katoa ka eke atu rātou ki runga i ō rātou kaipuke, ki ō rātou pōti rānei, ā, ka mānu atu ki runga i te moana, e tukua iho ana rātou e rātou anō ki te Ariki tō rātou Atua.

5 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka mea te Ariki kia puhia te hau pūkeri ki runga i te mata o ngā wai, whakatewhenua o te kupu whakaari; ā pēnei pīoioitia rātou ki runga i ngā ngaru o te moana i mua i te hau.

6 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, he maha ngā wā i tanumia iho rātou ki roto i ngā rire o te moana, nā ngā ngaru whakapuke i whatiwhatia iho nei ki runga i a rātou, me ngā tupuhi nui whakawehi anō hoki i hua ake ai i te hau pūkeri.

7 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, i te wā e tanumia ana rātou i roto i ngā rire o te moana kīhai i taea e ngā wai te tūkino i a rātou, i te mea he mea maru hoki ō rātou kaipuke kia rite ki tētahi oko, ā, i maru hoki ērā mea e rite ana ki te āka a Noa; nō reira ka karangatia atu rātou ki te Ariki i ngā wā i karapotia iho rātou e ngā wai maha, ā, nāna anō rātou i kawe ake ai ki runga ki ngā wai.

8 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, kāore i mutu te pupuhitanga o te hau whakatewhenua o te kupu whakaari i a rātou i runga i ngā wai; ā pēnei āia atu ai rātou ki mua i te hau.

9 Ā, i waiata whakamoemiti rātou ki te Ariki; āe rā, i waiata whakamoemiti te teina a Iarere ki te Ariki, ā, i whakawhetai ia, i whakawhetai ia ki te Ariki mō te roanga ake o te rā; ā, ina tau mai te pō, kāore i mutu tā rātou waiata whakamoemiti ki te Ariki.

10 Ā ka āia pēneitia atu rātou; ā, kāore i taea e tētahi taniwhā o te moana te whawhati iho i a rātou, e tētahi tohorā rānei te whakakino i a rātou; ā, hono tonu tā rātou whai māramatanga, i runga rānei i te wai, i raro rānei i te wai.

11 Ā, ka āia pēneitia atu rātou, e toru rau e whā tekau mā whā ngā rā i runga i te wai.

12 Ā, ka ū rātou ki uta ki te whenua o te kupu whakaari. Ā, ka tuohu iho rātou ki runga i te mata o te whenua i te wā i tau iho ō rātou waewae ki runga i te takutai o te whenua o te kupu whakaari, ā, ka whakaiti rātou i a rātou anō i mua i te aroaro o te Ariki, ā, ka heke iho ngā roimata i te hari i te aroaro o te Ariki, nā te nui o āna mahi aroha ki runga i a rātou.

13 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka haere atu rātou ki runga i te mata o te whenua, ā, ka tīmata tā rātou ngaki i te whenua.

14 Ā, he tokowhā ngā tama a Iarere; ā, i huaina rātou ko Hakoma, rātou ko Kirika, ko Maha, ko Oriha.

15 Ā, ka whānau ake anō te teina a Iarere i ngā tama me ngā tamāhine.

16 Ā, neke atu i te rua tekau mā rua te tokomahatanga o ngā hoa o Iarere rāua ko tana teina; ā, i whānau mai anō rātou i ngā tama me ngā tamāhine i mua i tā rātou ūnga mai ki te whenua o te kupu whakaari; ā, nō reira ka tīmata tā rātou tokomaha haeretanga.

17 Ā, i whakaakona rātou kia hīkoi whakaiti i te aroaro o te Ariki; ā, i whakaakona anō hoki rātou mai i ngā wāhi tiketike.

18 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka horapa haere rātou i runga i te mata o te whenua, ā, ka tīmata tā rātou whakatokomaha haere me tā rātou ngaki i te whenua; ā, ka pakari haere rātou i runga i te whenua.

19 Ā, ka koroheke haere te teina a Iarere, ā, ka kite ia meake heke iho ia ki te rua tūpāpaku; nā reira ka kī atu ia ki a Iarere: Tukua tāua kia whakakotahi i tō tātou iwi kia tatauria ai rātou, kia mōhio ai tāua he aha tā rātou hiahia ki a tāua i mua i tā tāua hekenga iho ki ō tāua rua tūpāpaku.

20 Ā, ka whakaminea te iwi kia rite ki ērā kōrero. Nā, kua rua tekau mā rua ngā tama me ngā tamāhine a te teina a Iarere; ā, kua tekau mā rua ngā tama me ngā tamāhine a Iarere, tokowhā āna tama.

21 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka tatauria tō rāua iwi; ā, whai muri iho i tā rāua tatau i a rātou, i hiahia rāua kia mōhio ai he aha ngā mea e hiahia nei rātou i a rāua i mua i tā rāua hekenga iho ki ō rāua rua tūpāpaku.

22 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, i te hiahia te iwi i a rāua kia whakawahia tētahi o ā rāua tama hei kīngi mō runga i a rātou.

23 Ināianei ā nana, he mea pōuri ki a rāua. Ā, ka kī atu te teina a Iarere ki a rātou: Kāore e kore mā konei ara ake ai te hereheretanga.

24 Engari ka kī atu a Iarere ki tana teina: Tukua kia whai kīngi ai rātou. Nō reira kī atu ai ia ki a rātou: Kōwhiria e koutou tētahi o ā māua tama hei kīngi, tā koutou pū anō e pai ai.

25 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, i kōwhiria te mātāmua a te teina a Iarere; ā, ko Pakaka tōna ingoa. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whakakorea e ia, kāore ia i pai hei kīngi mō rātou. Ā, i te hiahia te iwi kia kukume tōna matua i a ia, engari kīhai i pērā tōna matua; ā, ka whakahau ia ki a rātou kia kaua e kukume i tētahi tangata hei kīngi mō rātou.

26 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, i kōwhiria e rātou ngā teina katoa a Pakaka, ā, kīhai rātou i pai.

27 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, kīhai hoki ngā tama a Iarere i pai, ko ngā mea katoa hāunga tētahi; ā, ka whakawahia a Oriha hei kīngi i runga i te iwi.

28 Ā, ka tīmata tōna whakahaere, ā, ka kake haere te iwi; ā, ka tino whairawa haere te iwi.

29 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka mate a Iarere, ā, me tana teina anō hoki.

30 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, i hīkoi whakaiti a Oriha i te aroaro o te Ariki, ā, ka mahara ki te nui o ngā mea i mea ai te Ariki mō tōna matua, ā, i whakaako anō ia i tana iwi ki ngā mea nunui i mea ai te Ariki mō ō rātou matua.
ether 7:
[center][font_size=26]Upoko 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ka whakahaere a Oriha i runga i te tika—Ka whakatūria ngā kīngitanga o Hure me Kohoro i waenganui i ngā tukipoto me ngā ngangaretanga—Ka whakahē ngā poropiti i te whakarihariha me te whakapakokotanga o te iwi, kātahi ka rīpenetā rātou.[/i]

1 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whakahaere whakawā a Oriha ki runga i te whenua i runga i te tika i ōna rā katoa, he tino maha ōna rā.

2 Ā, ka whānau mai āna i ngā tama me ngā tamāhine; āe rā, i whānau mai āna i ngā mea toru tekau mā tahi, e rua tekau mā toru ngā tama.

3 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whānau mai tāna i a Kipi i tōna koroheketanga. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whakahaere a Kipi whai muri iho i a ia; ā, nā Kipi ko Korihoro.

4 Ā, ka haututū a Korihoro ki tōna matua i te wā e toru tekau mā rua tōna pakeke, ā, ka haere atu ia kia noho ai i te whenua o Niho; ā, ka whānau mai ia i ngā tama me ngā tamāhine, ā, ka tino ātaahua haere rātou; nā reira ka kukume atu a Korihoro i ngā tāngata tokomaha kia whai atu i a ia.

5 Ā, i te wā i whakakotahi ia i tētahi tauā ka haere ake ki te whenua o Morona te wāhi i noho ai te kīngi, ā, ka mauheretia ia, mā konā pahawa ake te kōrero a te teina a Iarere, nā, ka whakaraua rātou.

6 Nā, ko te whenua o Morono, i reira te kīngi e noho ana, e tata atu ana ki te whenua e karangatia ana ko te Whakangaromanga e ngā Nīwhai.

7 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka noho a Kipi i roto i te hereheretanga, me tōna iwi i raro i a Korihoro tana tama, kia koroheketia rawatia ia; hei aha koa ka whānau mai a Kipi i a Hure i tōna koroheketanga, i a ia e noho herehere tonu ana.

8 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, i te riri a Hure ki tana tuakana; ā, ka pakari haere a Hure, ā, ka mārohirohi haere ki te ritenga o tō te tangata kaha; ā, i kaha hoki ia i runga i te whakawākanga.

9 Nā reira, ka haere mai ia ki te puke o Eparaima, ā, nāna nei i whakarewa iho i te puke, ā, ka hangaia he hoari maitai mō te hunga i kumea atu ai e ia; ā, whai muri i tana whakamauranga i a rātou ki ngā hoari ka hoki ki te pā o Niho, ā, ka pakanga atu ki tana tuakana a Korihoro, mā konā rapu ai te kīngitanga, ā, ka whakahokia atu ki tōna matua a Kipi.

10 Ināianei ā, nā te mea i mea ai a Hure, ka whakataua iho e tōna matua te kīngitanga ki runga ki a ia; nō reira ka tīmata tana whakahaere i muri i tōna matua.

11 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, i whakahaere whakawā i runga i te tika; ā, ka horapa haere i a ia tōna kīngitanga ki runga i te mata o te whenua, nā te mea kua tokomaha rawatia te iwi.

12 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whānau mai a Hure i ngā tama me ngā tamāhine tokomaha.

13 Ā, ka rīpenetā a Korihoro i ngā mea kino i mea ai ia; nā reira ka hoatu e Hure he mana ki a ia i roto i tōna kīngitanga.

14 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, he tokomaha ngā tama me ngā tamāhine a Korihoro. Ā, kei waenganui i ngā tama a Korihoro tētahi ko Noa tana ingoa.

15 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka haututū atu a Noa ki a Hure, te kīngi, me tana matua anō hoki a Korihoro, ā, ka kumea atu tana teina a Kohoro, me ana teina katoa anō hoki me ngā tāngata tokomaha.

16 Ā, ka pakanga atu ia ki a Hure, te kīngi, mā konā riro ai i a ia tō rātou whenua tuku iho tuatahi; ā, ka meinga ia hei kīngi i runga i tērā wāhi o te whenua.

17 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka pakanga atu ia ki a Hure, te kīngi; ā, ka mau ia ki a Hure, te kīngi, ā, ka mauhereheretia atu ia ki roto o Morono.

18 Ā, i pahawa ake i a ia whano ka whakamate i a ia, ka ngōki atu ngā tama a Hure ki roto i te whare o Noa i te pō, ā, ka whakamatea ia, ā, ka turakina iho te tatau o te whareherehere, ā, ka whakaputaina mai tō rātou matua, ā, ka whakanohoia iho ia ki runga i tōna ake torona.

19 Nā reira, ka hangaia ake e te tama a Noa tōna kīngitanga i muri i a ia; hei aha koa kāore rātou i rapu mana atu anō ki runga i a Hure te kīngi, ā, ka kake nui te iwi i raro i te whakahere a kīngi Hure, ā, ka tupu kaha.

20 Ā, ka weheruatia te whenua; ā, e rua ngā kīngitanga, ko te kīngitanga o Hure, me te kīngitanga o Kohoro, te tama a Noa.

21 Ā, ka mea a Kohoro, te tama a Noa i tana iwi kia pakanga atu ki a Hure, nā konā hinga ai rātou i a Hure, ā, ka whakamate a Kohoro.

22 Ināianei ā, he tama tā Kohoro ko Nimirota tōna ingoa; ā, ka tukua atu e Nimirota te kīngitanga o Kohoro ki a Hure, ā, ka makau haere ia i ngā karu o Hure; nā reira ka whakatau iho a Hure i ngā makauranga nui ki runga ki a ia, ā, i mahi ia i tāna i pai ai i roto i te kīngitanga o Hure.

23 I a Hure e kīngi ana ka puta mai ngā poropiti tokomaha ki waenganui i te iwi, he mea tono e te Ariki, e poropiti ana, nā, i te kukume iho te whakarihariha me te whakapakoko o te iwi i tētahi kanga ki runga i te whenua, ā, ka whakangaromia rātou ki te kore rātou e rīpenetā.

24 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka haututū te iwi ki ō rātou poropiti, ā, ka whakatoia rātou. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whakahaere whakawā a kīngi Hure ki runga i te hunga katoa i whakatoi ai i ngā poropiti.

25 Ā, ka whakaritea e ia tētahi ture puta noa i te whenua katoa, e tuku mana ana ki ngā poropiti e taea ai e rātou te haere ki ngā wāhi katoa e pai ai; ā, mā tēnei kaupapa kukume mai anō te iwi ki te rīpenetātanga.

26 Ā, tohu te Ariki i te iwi mō rātou i rīpenetā i ō rātou kino me ō rātou whakapakoko, ā, ka tīmata tā rātou kake anō i te whenua. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whānau mai a Hure i ngā tama me ngā tamāhine i tōna koroheketanga.

27 Ā, kāore he pakanga anō i ngā rā o Hure; ā, i maumhara ia ki ngā mea nunui i mea ai te Ariki mō ōna matua i tana kawenga mai i a rātou ki tua o te rire nui ki roto i te whenua o te kupu whakaari; nā reira i whakahaere whakawā ia i runga i te tika i ōna rā katoa.
ether 8:
[center][font_size=26]Upoko 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]He nui te ngangaretanga me te tautohetohenga i runga i te kīngitanga—Ka whakaritea e Akihi tētahi whakakotahitanga herenga-oati ki te whakamate i te kīngi—Nō te rēwera ngā whakakotahitanga huna, ko tōna hua he whakangaromanga mō ngā iwi—Ka whakatūpatoria ngā Tauiwi Moroki mō te whakakotahitanga e whai nei ki te turaki i te herekoretanga o ō rātou whenua katoa, me ō rātou iwi katoa.[/i]

1 Ā, i pahawa ake, nāna ko Omere, ā, ka whakahaere a Omere i muri i a ia. Ā, nā Omere ko Iarere; ā, ka whānau mai a Iarere i ngā tama me ngā tamāhine.

2 Ā, ka haututū a Iarere ki tōna matua, ā, ka haere mai ia ki te noho i te whenua o Heta. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whakapatipati ia i ngā tāngata tokomaha, nā ana kupu tinihanga, kia riro i a ia te haurua o te kīngitanga.

3 Ā, i te wā i riro i a ia te haurua o te kīngitanga ka pakanga atu ki tōna matua, ā, nāna tōna matua i mauhere atu, ā, ka whakamahia ia i roto i te hereheretanga;

4 Ināianei ā, i ngā rā o te whakahaeretanga o Omere, kei roto ia i te hereheretanga mō te haurua o ōna rā. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whānau ia i ngā tama me ngā tamāhine, ko Eremo rāua ko Koriatuma ētahi o rātou;

5 Ā, i te tino pukuriri rāua nā ngā mahinga ā tō rāua tuakana, nā konā whakatūria e rāua tētahi tauā, ā, ka pakanga atu ki a Iarere. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka pakanga atu rāua ki a ia i te pō.

6 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, i te wā i whakamatea te tauā a Iarere, whano rātou ka whakamate i a ia anō hoki; ā, ka inoi atu ia kei whakamate rātou i a ia, ki te pērā ka tuku atu ia i te kīngitanga ki tōna matua. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka tohua tōna oranga.

7 Ināianei ā, ka tino pōuri rawa a Iarere nō te ngaronga atu o tōna kīngitanga, nā te mea i whakatau iho tōna ngākau ki runga i te kīngitanga me te korōria o te ao.

8 Nā, he tino mātanga te tamāhine a Iarere, ā, i tana kitenga atu i ngā pōuritanga o tōna matua, ka whakaaro ake i tētahi mahere mā konā whakahokia te kīngitanga ki tōna matua.

9 Nā, he tino ātaahua te tamāhine a Iarere. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka kōrero ia ki tana matua, ā, ka kī atu ki a ia: He aha i pēnei ai te pōuri nui o tōku matua? Kāore anō rānei ia kia pānui i te tuhinga i kawea mai nei e ō tāua tūpuna ki tua i te rire nui? Nana, kāore rānei i reira tētahi tuhinga e pā ana ki a rātou o mua, nā, i riro ai i a rātou ngā kīngitanga me te korōria nui nā ā rātou mahere huna?

10 Ināianei ā, nō reira, tukua tōku matua kia tono atu i a Akihi, te tama a Kiminoro; ā nana, he ātaahua ahau, ā, ka kanikani au i tōna aroaro, ā, māku ia e whakaahuareka, nō ka hiahia mai ia ki a au hei wahine māna; nā reira ka hiahia ia i a koe kia hoatu au ki a ia hei hoawahine māna, kātahi ka kī atu koe: Māku ia e tuku ki te mauria mai e koe te māhunga o tōku matua, te kīngi.

11 Ināianei ā, he hoa a Omere nō Akihi; nā reira, i te tononga atu a Iarere i a Akihi, ka kanikani te tamāhine a Iarere i tōna aroaro, ā, ka whakaahuareka i a ia, nā konā hiahia ai ia i a ia hei hoawahine māna. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka kī atu ia ki a Iarere: Homai ia ki ahau hei hoawahine māku.

12 Ā, ka kī atu a Iarere ki a ia: Māku ia e hoatu ki a koe, mēnā ka mauria mai ki ahau te māhunga o tōku matua, te kīngi.

13 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whakaminea ngātahitia e Akihi ana huānga katoa ki roto i te whare o Iarere, ā, ka kī atu ki a rātou: Ka oati koutou ki ahau kia pono koutou ki ahau i roto i te mea māku e tono atu nei ki a koutou?

14 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka oati katoa rātou ki a ia, i runga i te Atua o te rangi, me ngā rangi anō hoki, i runga i te whenua anō hoki, me ō rātou māhunga anō hoki, nā, ka riro atu te māhunga o te tangata e kōtiti atu i te āwhina e tonoa ai e Akihi; ā, ki te whāki atu tētahi i tētahi mea i whakamōhiotia atu e Akihi ki a rātou, koia hoki e riro atu i tōna oranga.

15 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, i whakaae pēnei rātou ki tā Akihi. Ā, ka mahia atu e Akihi ki a rātou ngā oati i tukuna iho e rātou te hunga onamata i whai ai ki te rapu mana, he mea tuku iho e Kaina, koia tētahi kaikōhuru nō te tīmatanga.

16 Ā, i tautokona rātou e te mana o te rēwera kia mahia ēnei oati ki te iwi, kia mau tonu ki a rātou i roto i te pōuritanga, kia āwhina ai i te hunga rapu mana kia rapu mana, kia kōhuru, kia pāhua, kia rūkahu, kia mahia ai ngā tūmomo whakarihariha me ngā pūremutanga.

17 Ā, nā te tamāhine a Iarere i puru ki roto i tōna ngākau kia kimihia ēnei mea onamata; ā, nā Iarere i puru ki roto i tō Akihi ngākau; nā reira, ka mahia atu e Akihi ki ana huānga me ōna hoa, e ārahina atu ana rātou i runga i ngā whakaari whakapatipati kia mahia tāna i pai ai.

18 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whakaritea e rātou tētahi huinga huna, e rite ana ki a rātou nō onamata; ko taua whakakotahitanga he mea mōrikarika, ā, he mea whakarihariha i runga i ngā mea katoa, i te tirohanga a te Atua;

19 Nā te mea kāore te Ariki e mahi ana i roto i ngā whakakotahitanga huna, kāore rānei ia e mea kia whakaheke te tangata i te toto, engari kua kīa kia kaua i roto i ngā mea katoa, mai i te tīmatanga o te tangata.

20 Ināianei ahau, a Moronai, e kore nei e tuhituhi i ā rātou tūmomo oati me ā rātou whakakotahitanga, nā te mea kua whakamōhiotia mai ki ahau kei waenganui ēnā mea i ngā iwi katoa, ā, kei roto anō i ngā Rāmana.

21 Ā, nā ēnei mea anō te whakangaromanga o tēnei iwi e kōrerotia ake nei e ahau, me te whakangaromanga anō hoki o te iwi o Nīwhai.

22 Ā, ko te iwi e tautoko ake i ngā whakakotahitanga huna pērā, kia rapu mana, kia whai taonga, kia horapa haere i runga i te iwi, nana, ka whakangaromia rātou; nā te mea e kore te Ariki e tuku ngā toto o te hunga tapu, e whakahekea iho ai e rātou, e hono tonu ai te karanga ake ki a ia i te whenua mō te utu ki runga ki a rātou, engari ka kore ia e rapu utu ki runga i a rātou.

23 Nā reira, E koutou e ngā Tauiwi, he whaimātauranga ia nō te Atua kia whakakitea atu ēnei mea ki a koutou, kia rīpenetā koutou i ō koutou hara, ā, kaua e tuku kia eke ake ēnei whakakotahitanga huna ki runga i a koutou, he mea hanga ake kia whaimana, ā, kia whai taonga—me te mahi, āe rā, ka tau mai pū anō te mahi whakangaromanga ki runga i a koutou, ki tō koutou turakinga me tō koutou whakangaromanga ki te tuku ēnei mea kia puta mai.

24 Nā reira, e whakahau ana te Ariki i a koutou, ina kite koutou i ēnei mea e puta mai ana ki waenganui i a koutou, nā, ka oho ake ki tētahi mātauranga mō tō koutou āhuatanga weriweri, nā tēnei whakakotahitanga huna kei roto nei i a koutou; auē rānei te mate mō tēnei mea, nā ngā toto o te hunga kua whakamatea iho nei; nā te mea kei te karanga ake rātou i te puehu kia rapu utu ki runga i taua mea, ki runga hoki i te hunga katoa nāna nei tēnei i hanga.

25 Nā te mea e pahawa ake ana, nā, ko te tangata e hangaia ake tēnei mea e whai ana ki te turaki iho i te herekoretanga o ngā whenua katoa, o ngā iwi katoa; ā, mā konā pahawa ake ai te whakangaromanga ki ngā tāngata katoa, nā te mea kua hangaia ake e te rēwera, koia te matua o ngā rūkahu katoa; ko taua kairūkahu pū anō nāna nei ō tātou mātua tuatahi i tinihanga, āe rā, ko taua kairūkahu pū anō nāna nei te tangata i mea kia kōhuru mai i te tīmatanga; nāna nei ngā ngākau o te tangata i whakapakeke nā konei rātou kōhuru ai i ngā poropiti, kua ākina ki te kohatu, kua makaia ki waho, mai i te tīmatanga.

26 Nā reira ahau, a Moronai, e whakahaua ana kia tuhia ēnei mea kia whakakorehia atu te kino, ā, kia tae mai te wā e kore ō Hātana kaha ki runga i ngā ngākau o ngā tamariki a te tangata, engari kia whakapakepakea rātou kia mahi pai i ngā wā katoa, kia haere mai ai rātou ki te mātāpuna o te tika katoa, ā, kia whakaorangia ai.
ether 9:
[center][font_size=26]Upoko 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ka riro atu te kīngitanga mai i tētahi ki tētahi atu he mea nā te tāhū, te whakangārahu me te kōhuru—I kite a Emere i te Tama o te Tika—He tokomaha ngā poropiti e karanga ake nei i te rīpenetātanga—Ka muia te iwi e te matekai me ngā nākahi paitini.[/i]

1 Ināianei ahau, a Moronai, e haere tonu nei taku tuhinga. Nō reira, nana, i pahawa ake nā te whakakotahitanga huna a Akihi me ōna hoa, nana, ka turakina e rātou te kīngitanga o Omere.

2 Hei aha koa, i aroha te Ariki ki a Omere, ki āna tama anō hoki, ā, ki āna tamāhine kīhai i whai i tōna whakangaromanga.

3 Ā, ka whakatūpato te Ariki i a Omere i roto i tētahi moemoeā kia wehe atu ia i te whenua; nā reira, ka wehe atu a Omere i te whenua me tana whānau, ā, ka haere mō ngā rā maha, ā, ka haere mai, ā, ka tōhipa atu i te puke o Himi, ā, ka haere mai ki te wāhi i whakangaromia nei ngā Nīwhai, ā, atu i reira ki te taha rāwhiti, ā, ka tae atu ki tētahi wāhi e kīa ana ko Aporima, i te taha o te takutai moana, ā, ka whakatūria ake tōna tēneti i reira, me āna tama rātou ko āna tamāhine anō hoki, me tōna whare katoa, atu i a Iarere rātou ko tōna whānau.

4 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whakawahia a Iarere hei kīngi i runga i te iwi, e te ringa o te whakarihariha; ā, ka tukuna atu tana tamāhine ki a Akihi hei hoawahine māna.

5 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whai atu a Akihi i te oranga o tana hungarei; ā, ka tono atu ia ki aua hunga nāna nei i whakaoati i runga i ngā oati o te hunga onamata, ā, ka riro i a rātou te māhunga o tōna hungarei, i a ia e noho ana i runga i tōna torona, e whakarongo ana ki tōna iwi.

6 Nā te mea, anō te nui o te horapa haeretanga o tēnei huinga huna whakarihariha, nā, kua pokea ngā ngākau katoa o te iwi; nō reira i kōhuru a Iarere i runga i tōna torona, ā, ka kīngi a Akihi i muri i a ia.

7 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka pūhaehae haere a Akihi ki tana tama, nō reira ka tūtakina ia ki roto i te whareherehere, ā, i iti rawa te kai i whāngaia atu māna, ā, mate noa ia.

8 Ināianei ā, ka riri te teina o te mea i mate ai, (ā ko Nimira tōna ingoa) ki tōna matua nā tā tōna matua i mea ai ki tōna tuakana.

9 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whakakao mai a Nimira i tētahi ope iti, ā, ka tāhuti atu i te whenua, ā, ka haere mai, ā, ka noho tahi me Omere.

10 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whānau a Akihi i ērā atu tama, ā, ka riro i a rātou ngā ngākau o te iwi, hei aha koa i oati rātou ki a ia kia mea ai i ngā tūmomo kino katoa e rite ana ki tāna i hiahia ai.

11 Nā, i te hiahia te iwi o Akihi kia whai taonga, e rite ana ki a Akihi i hiahia ai ki te whaimana, nā reira, ka tuku atu ngā tama a Akihi i te putea ki a rātou, nā konā tōia atu anō te wāhi nui o te iwi ki a rātou.

12 Ā, ka tīmata tētahi pakanga i waenganui i ngā tama a Akihi me Akihi, hono tonu tēnei mō ngā tau maha, āe rā, e tata tae atu ana ki te whakangaromanga katoatanga o ngā tāngata o te kīngitanga, āe rā, pau katoa, atu i ngā wairua toru tekau, me te hunga i tahuti atu i te taha o Omere.

13 Nā reira, ka whakahokia anōtia a Omere ki tōna whenua tuku iho.

14 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka koroheke haere a Omere; hei aha koa, ka whānau mai ia i a Emere i tōna koroheketanga; ā, ka whakawahi ia i a Emere hei kīngi i muri i a ia.

15 Ā, i muri iho i tana whakawahinga i a Emere hei kīngi ka kite ia i te maungārongo i runga i te whenua katoa mō te takiwā o ngā tau e rua, ā, ka mate ia, he maha rawa atu ngā rā i kite ai ia, e kī ana i te pōuritanga. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whakahaere a Emere i muri i a ia, ā, ka whakakī ia i ngā tapuae o tōna matua.

16 Ā, ka tīmata atu anō tā te Ariki tango i tōna kanga i te whenua, ā, ka kake rawa te whare o Emere i raro i tōna whakahaeretanga; ā, ka pakari rawa rātou i roto i te takiwā o ngā tau e ono ngahuru mā rua, nā konā ka tino whairawa rawa atu rātou—

17 I a rātou ngā tū huarākau, me ngā kākano, me ngā hiraka, me ngā rīnena papai, me te kōura, me te hiriwā, me ngā mea utu nui;

18 Me ngā tū kau katoa anō hoki, ngā ōkiha, ngā kau, ngā hipi, ngā poaka, ngā koati, me ērā atu tūmomo kararehe e pai ana hei kai mā te tangata.

19 Ā, i a rātou anō hoki he hōiho, he kāihe, ā, he arawhana, he kureroma, he kumomo i reira; he pai katoa ērā mea mā te tangata, he tino pērā anō ngā arawhana me ngā kureroma me ngā kumomo.

20 Ā pēnei ringihia iho ai e te Ariki āna manaakitanga ki runga i tēnei whenua, he whenua pai rawa ake i ngā whenua katoa; ā, ka whakahau ia kia nōhia ai te whenua e te hunga mō tā te Ariki e pai ai, ki te kore ka whakangaromia rātou ina pakari rātou i roto i te kino; nā konā rā, e ai tā te Ariki: Māku te raneatanga o tōku riri e maringi iho.

21 Ā, ka whakahaere whakawā a Emere i runga i te tika i ōna rā katoa, ā, i whānau mai ia i ngā tama me ngā tamāhine tokomaha; ā, nāna ko Koriatumu, ā, ka whakawahi ia i a Koriatumu hei kīngi i muri i a ia.

22 Ā, i muri iho i tana whakawahi i a Koriatumu hei kīngi i muri i a ia ka ora ia mō ngā tau e whā, ā, ka kite ia i te maungārongo i runga i te whenua katoa; āe rā, i kite ake anō ia i te Tama o te Tika, ā, i hari ia, i whakakorōria ia i tōna rā; ā, ka mate ia i runga i te rangimārie.

23 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka hīkoi a Koriatumu i roto i ngā tapuae o tōna matua, ā, nāna ngā pā kaha maha i waihanga ake, ā, i mahia ērā mea e pai ana ki tōna iwi i ōna rā katoa. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, kāore he tamariki āna kia tino koroheke rawa ia.

24 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka mate tana hoawahine, kua kotahi rau mā rua tōna pakeke. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka mau a Koriatumu ki tētahi kōtiro hei hoawahine māna i tana koroheketanga, ā, ka whānau mai i ngā tama me ngā tamāhine tokomaha; nā reira i ora ia tae noa atu kia kotahi rau e whā ngahuru mā rua tau te pakeke.

25 Ā, i pahawa ake, nāna ko Komo, ā, ka kīngi a Komo i muri i a ia; ā, ka whakahaere ia mō ngā tau e whā ngahuru mā iwa, ā, nāna ko Heta; ā, i whānau mai anō ia i ētahi atu tama me ētahi atu tamāhine.

26 Ā, kua horapa haere anō te iwi ki runga i te mata katoa o te whenua, ā, ka tīmata atu anō tētahi whakarihariha i runga i te mata o te whenua, ā, ka tīmata anō tā Heta tauapo i ngā tikanga huna onamata, kia whakangaro atu i tōna matua.

27 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka turakina e ia tōna matua i runga i te torona, nā te mea i whakamate ia i a ia ki tana ake hoari; ā, ka kīngi ia i muri i a ia.

28 Ā, ka haere mai anō ētahi poropiti ki roto i te whenua, e karanga atu ana i te rīpenetātanga ki a rātou—nā, me matua whakarite rātou i te huarahi o te Ariki, ki te kore ka tau mai tētahi kanga ki runga i te mata o te whenua; āe rā, ka tau mai pū anō tētahi matekai nui, mā konā whakangaromia katoatia rātou ki te kore rātou e rīpenetā.

29 Engari kāore te iwi i whakapono ki ngā kupu a ngā poropiti, engari ka makaia atu rātou e rātou; ā, ko ētahi i makaia ki roto i ngā rua, ā, mahue ana rātou kia mate. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, i meatia ēnei mea katoa e rātou e rite ana ki te whakahau a te kīngi, a Heta.

30 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka tīmata tētahi kāhoretanga nui i runga i te whenua, ā, ka tīmata wawe rawa te whakangaronga o ngā tangata whenua he mea nā te kāhoretanga, nā te mea kāore he ua i runga i te mata o te whenua.

31 Ā, ka puta mai ngā nākahi paitini anō hoki ki runga i te mata o te whenua, ā, ka whakamate i ngā tāngata tokomaha. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka tīmata atu te tahutitanga atu o ā rātou kāhui i te aroaro o ngā nākahi paitini, ki te whenua whakatetonga, i karangatia nei e ngā Nīwhai ko Harahemara.

32 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, he maha ērā mea i ngaro atu ai i runga i te huarahi; hei aha koa, i reira ētahi i tahuti atu ai ki roto i te whenua whakatetonga.

33 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka mea te Ariki i ngā nākahi kia kaua e arumia tonutia atu, engari kia kaupare atu i te huarahi e kore ai te tangata e hipa atu, nā, ka mate te tangata e ngana ai kia hipa atu i reira i ngā nākahi paitini.

34 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whai atu te iwi i te ara i haere ai ngā kararehe, ā, ka kainga ngā tīnana o ngā mea i hinga mai rā i te ara, kia kainga katoatia ērā mea katoa. Nā, i te kitenga ake o te iwi ka mate rātou ka tīmata tā rātou rīpenetā i ō rātou kino, ā, ka karanga ake ki te Ariki.

35 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, i te wā i tika tā rātou whakaiti i a rātou anō i te aroaro o te Ariki ka tukuna e ia te ua ki runga i te mata o te whenua; ā, ka hauora anō te iwi, ā, ka ai he huarākau i ngā whenua whakateraki, me ngā whenua huri noa. Ā, ka whakaatu atu te Ariki i tōna kaha ki a rātou i tana tiaki i a rātou i te matekai.
ether 10:
[center][font_size=26]Upoko 10[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ka taua haere tētahi kīngi i tētahi—He tika ētahi o ngā kīngi; he kino ētahi atu—Ina kaha ake te tika, ka manaakitia te iwi, ā, ka whaiorangia rātou e te Ariki.[/i]

1 Ā, i pahawa ake, i a Heha, koia tētahi uri o Heta—nā te mea i mate a Heta i te matekai, me tōna whare katoa atu i a Heha—nā reira, ka tīmata a Heha ki te hanga ake anō i tētahi iwi pakaru.

2 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka mahara a Heha i te whakangaromanga o ōna tūpuna, ā, nāna tētahi kīngitanga tika i hanga ake ai; nā te mea i mahara ia ki tā te Ariki i mahi ai i tana haringa mai i te teina a Iarere ki tua o te rirenga; ā, i hīkoi ia i ngā huarahi o te Ariki; ā, i whānau mai ia i ngā tama me ngā tamāhine.

3 Ā, ko tana tama mātāmua, ko Heha tōna ingoa, ka haututū ki a ia; hei aha koa, ka pākia a Heha e te ringa o tētahi kaipāhua, nā tana tino whai taonga, nā konā tau mai anō te rangimārie ki tōna matua.

4 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka hanga ake tōna matua i ngā pā maha i runga i te mata o te whenua, ā, ka horapa haere anō te iwi ki runga i te mata katoa o te whenua. Ā, ka tino koroheke haere a Heha ki tētahi pakeketanga tino kaumātua rawa atu; ā, nāna ko Ripakihi. Ā, ka mate ia, ā, ka whakahaere a Ripakihi i muri i a ia.

5 Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, kīhai a Ripakihi i mahi i ērā mea e pai ana i te tirohanga a te Ariki, nā te mea he tokomaha āna hoawahine me ngā hoawahine tūtūā, ā, ka whakatakotohia iho tērā ki runga i ō ngā tāngata pokohiwi, ā, he mea taumaha hei waha; āe rā, i tākehia rātou e ia ki ngā tāke taumaha; ā, ka hangaia ake e ia ngā whare tino nunui ki ērā tāke.

6 Ā, ka whakatūria e ia tētahi torona tino ātaahua rawa atu; ā, i hanga ake ia i ngā whareherehere maha, ā, ka makaia e ia te tangata e kore nei e tuku tāke ki roto i te whareherehere; ā, ka makaia e ia te tangata e kore nei e āhei ki te tuku tāke ki roto i te whareherehere; ā, ka mea ia kia hono tonu tā rātou mahi hei oranga mō rātou; ā, ka meinga e ia te tangata e kore nei e mahi kia whakamatea.

7 Nā reira i whiwhi ia i āna mahi papai katoa, āe rā, ka mea ia kia tahia āna kōura parakore i roto i te whareherehere; ā, he maha ngā tūmomo mahinga whakarākei i meinga ai e ia kia mahia i roto i te whareherehere. Ā, i pahawa ake, nā, ka whakamamaetia te iwi e ia ki ana pūremutanga me ana mōrikarikatanga.

8 Ā, i te wā kua oti i a ia hei kīngi mō te takiwā o ngā tau e whā ngahuru mā rua ka ara ake te iwi i runga i te haututūtanga ki a ia; ā, ka tīmata tētahi pakanga anō i te whenua, nā konā patua iho a Ripakihi, ā, ka āia atu ōna uri katoa ki waho i te whenua.
