19 Ā, e hiahia ana au kia akiaki i a koutou, e aku teina aroha, kia mahara koutou he rite ia inānahi, ināianei, ā, āke tonu atu, ā, ko ēnei takoha katoa kua kōrerotia ake nei, koia he mea wairua, e kore rawa e whakamutua atu, i ngā wā katoa e tū ana te ao, e rite ana anake ki te whakaponokore o ngā tamariki a te tangata.

20 Nā reira, me ai he whakapono; ā, mehemea me ai he whakapono me ai anō hoki he tūmanako; ā, mehemea me ai he tūmanako me ai anō hoki he aroha noa.

21 Ā, ki te kore ō koutou aroha noa, e kore rawa koutou e whakaorangia i roto i te kīngitanga o te Atua; e kore rawa rānei koutou e taea te whakaora i roto i te kīngitanga o te Atua mehemea kāore ō koutou whakapono; e kore rawa koutou e taea ki te kore ō koutou tūmanako.

22 Ā, ki te kore ō koutou tūmanako, he tika kei te ngākau kore koutou; ā, ka puta te ngākau kore nā te kino.

23 Ā, i pono tā te Karaiti kōrero atu ki ō tātou tūpuna: Mehemea he whakapono tōu ka taea e koutou ngā mea katoa e tika ana ki ahau.

24 Ināianei ā, e kōrero ana au ki a koutou e ngā tōpito katoa o te ao—nā, ki te haere mai te rā e whakamutua atu te mana me ngā takoha a te Atua i waenganui i a koutou, ka meatia nā te whakaponokore.

25 Ā, auē te mate mō ngā tamariki a te tangata mehemea koinei te āhua; nā te mea kāore i reira tētahi e mahi pai ai i waenganui i a koutou, kāore kau te mea kotahi. Nā te mea mehemea i reira tētahi i waenganui i a koutou e mahi pai ana, ka mahi ia i runga i te mana me ngā takoha a te Atua.

26 Ā, auē te mate mō te hunga e whakamutua atu ana ēnei mea, ā, ka mate, nā te mea ka mate rātou i roto i ō rātou hara, ā, tē taea rātou te whakaora i roto i te kīngitanga o te Atua; ā, kei te kōrerotia tērā e au e rite ana ki ngā kupu a te Karaiti;

27 Ā, e akiaki ana au i a koutou kia mahara ki ēnei mea; nā te mea e wawe mai ana te wā e mōhio ai koutou kāore au i te rūkahu, nā te mea ka kite koutou i ahau i te pae o te Atua; ā, ka kī atu te Ariki te Atua ki a koutou: Kāore au i whakapuaki atu i aku kupu ki a koutou, kua tuhia nei e tēnei tangata, e rite ana ki tētahi e karanga ake ana i te mate, āe rā, e rite ana ki tētahi e kōrero ake ana i te puehu?

28 Kei te whakapuaki atu au i ēnei mea ki a koutou hei whakatutukiranga i ngā poropititanga. Ā nana, ka puta atu ēnei mea i te māngai o te Atua Ora Tonu; ā, ka whakahī atu tana kupu i tēnei whakatipuranga ki tētahi atu whakatipuranga.

29 Ā, ka whakakite atu te Atua ki a koutou, he pono tāku i tuhituhi ai.

30 Hei āpiti anō ka akiaki au i a koutou kia haere mai ki te Karaiti, kia mau ki ngā takoha pai katoa, kia kaua e pā atu ki te takoha kino, ki te mea poke rānei.

31 Ā, e oho, whakatika ake i te puehu, E Hiruharama; āe rā, whakamaua ō koutou kākahu ātaahua, E te tamāhine a Hīona; ā, whakakahangia āu takiwā, ā, whakanuia ō koutou rohe mō āke tonu atu, kia kore tonu koutou e whakapōauautia tonutia, kia tutuki ai ngā kawenata a te Matua Ora Tonu i kawenata ai ia ki a koe, E te whare o Iharaira.

32 Āe rā, haere mai ki te Karaiti, kia whakatikaina ake i roto i a ia, ā, whakakorengia atu e koutou te hē katoa i a koutou; ā, ki te whakakorengia atu ngā hē katoa i a koutou anō, kia aroha koutou ki te Atua i runga i tō koutou ngoi katoa, hinengaro katoa me tō koutou kaha, kātahi ka ranea tōna aroha ki a koutou, nā, mā tōna aroha koutou e whakatikaina ake nei i roto i te Karaiti; ā, mehemea ka tino tika rawa atu koutou i roto i te Karaiti i runga i te aroha o te Atua, kāore e taea ana e koutou te whakakāhore nei i te mana o te Atua.

33 Hei āpiti anō, mehemea ka tino tika rawa atu koutou i roto i te Karaiti i runga i te aroha o te Atua, e kore rānei e whakakāhore i tōna mana, kātahi koutou ka whakatapua i roto i te Karaiti i runga i te aroha o te Atua, mā roto i te whakahekenga o te toto o te Karaiti, kei roto nei i te kawenata a te Matua ki te murunga i ō koutou hara, kia meinga tapu koutou, kia kohakore ai.

34 Ināianei ā, ko taku poroporoaki tēnei ki a koutou katoa. Meake ka haere au kia okioki i te pararaiha o te Atua, kia whakakotahi mai anō tōku wairua me tōku tīnana, ā, ka kawea ahau i runga i te hau, kia tūtaki atu ki a koe i mua i te pae āhuareka o Ihowa nui, te Kaiwhakawā Ora Tonu me te hunga ora me te hunga mate. Āmine.
